programme.title: It
programme.desc: Premiere. In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of their small New England town. Horror based on the Stephen King novel, starring Bill Skarsgard, Jaeden Lieberher and Sophia Lillis.

programme.desc: Premiere. Four teenage Ohio skateboarders find their friendship tested when they cross paths with an underworld criminal. Drama, starring Jorge Lendeborg Jr, Moises Arias and Rafi Gavron.

programme.title: The Layover
programme.desc: Two friends on a trip compete for the affections of a handsome man when their flight is redirected due to a hurricane. Comedy, starring Alexandra Daddario, Matt Barr and Kate Upton.

programme.title: Some Freaks
programme.desc: A one eyed-boy and an overweight girl fall in love. However, when she loses weight after going to college, their relationship is tested in devastating ways. Romantic comedy drama, starring Marin Ireland, Thomas Mann and Elise Hudson.

programme.desc: An android-hunter's discovery of a long-buried secret leads him to track down former detective Rick Deckard, who's been missing for 30 years. Denis Villeneuve's Oscar-winning sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Gosling, Harrison Ford and Jared Leto.

programme.title: Blood Money
programme.desc: Premiere. Three friends on a wilderness excursion must outrun a white collar criminal hell-bent on retrieving his cash, but soon their greed turns them against each other. Crime drama, starring Ellar Coltrane, Willa Fitzgerald and Jacob Artist.

programme.title: Godless
programme.desc: Premiere. A nurse trades the ID cards of dementia patients on the black market. Drama, starring Irena Ivanova, Ventzislav Konstantinov and Ivan Nalbantov. In Danish.(n)

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: A former professional basketball player agrees to coach a high-school team, but he is unimpressed by its lack of discipline and instigates a tough new regimen. All goes well until the youngsters start to become complacent, forcing him to take drastic action - which leads to a backlash of complaints from angry parents and pupils alike. Drama, with Samuel L Jackson, Ashanti, Rob Brown and Robert Ri'chard.

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell.

programme.title: Carousel
programme.desc: A criminal struggling to support his pregnant wife dies during a botched armed robbery, but is given the chance to return to life 15 years later to help his family and teach his daughter a valuable lesson. Adaptation of Rodgers and Hammerstein's musical, starring Gordon MacRae, Shirley Jones, Cameron Mitchell, Barbara Ruick and Gene Lockhart.

programme.title: West Side Story
programme.desc: Two teenagers from rival New York street gangs, the Jets and the Sharks, fall in love - but it causes already simmering tensions to explode. Leonard Bernstein and Stephen Sondheim's Oscar-winning musical based on Romeo and Juliet, adapted from the stage play, starring Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno and George Chakiris.

programme.title: Life on the Line
programme.desc: The head of a power line team is sent in to fix the grid just as a huge storm hits Texas. True-life action thriller, starring John Travolta, Kate Bosworth and Sharon Stone.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A Marine serving in Iraq finds a photograph of a woman belonging to an unknown fellow soldier, and considers it his good luck charm. When he returns to America, he decides to track her down, and after taking a job at her family's boarding kennels, falls in love with her. Romantic drama, with Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling and Blythe Danner.

programme.title: Billy Lynn's Long Halftime Walk
programme.desc: A 19-year-old private is brought home for a victory tour after a harrowing Iraq battle, as flashbacks show what really happened to his squad - contrasting the realities of war with America's perceptions. Drama, starring Joe Alwyn, Garrett Hedlund and Arturo Castro.

programme.title: Loving
programme.desc: Interracial couple Richard and Mildred Loving are targeted by the authorities in 1950s Virginia, leading to an historic legal battle. Fact-based drama, starring Ruth Negga, Joel Edgerton and Will Dalton.

programme.title: The Phantom of the Opera
programme.desc: A disfigured composer lurks in the catacombs beneath a Paris opera house, giving rise to stories that the building is haunted. The lonely maestro becomes infatuated with a talented young singer, and plans to turn her into a star. However, his love for her is doomed to end in tragedy. Adaptation of Andrew Lloyd Webber's musical, starring Gerard Butler, Emmy Rossum, Miranda Richardson and Minnie Driver.

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: A shy would-be songwriter leaves her rural home and heads for the big city, where she takes a job in a bustling New York bar - but musical success could be just around the corner. Comedy drama, starring Piper Perabo, Adam Garcia, Maria Bello, Izabella Miko and John Goodman.

programme.title: The Lucky One
programme.desc: A Marine serving in Iraq finds a photograph of a woman belonging to an unknown fellow soldier, and considers it his good luck charm. When he returns to America, he decides to track her down, and after taking a job at her family's boarding kennels, falls in love with her. Romantic drama, with Zac Efron, Taylor Schilling and Blythe Danner.

programme.title: Palm Swings
programme.desc: After moving to Palm Springs, a young married couple puts their love to the test when they discover that their neighbours are swingers. Comedy drama, starring Sugar Lyn Beard, Tia Carrere and Diane Farr.

programme.title: Tristan and Isolde
programme.desc: The love affair that develops between an English warrior and an Irish princess, while their two countries are at war, ends when the knight has to return to England in the service of his lord. The princess's cruel father then decides to auction her off for marriage to an English nobleman, forcing the former lovers to keep their relationship a secret. Romantic adventure set in the Dark Ages, with James Franco, Sophia Myles and Rufus Sewell.

programme.title: Zorba the Greek
programme.desc: A timid English writer arrives in Crete to open a mine for the family business and falls under the spell of a local peasant with a charismatic and inspiring zest for life. Drama, starring Anthony Quinn, Alan Bates, Irene Papas, Lila Kedrova and Sotiris Moustakas.

programme.title: Being Charlie
programme.desc: Forced into rehab by his parents, rebellious 18-year-old Charlie encounters another troubled youth, the beautiful Eva. Drama, starring Nick Robinson, Morgan Saylor, Common and Cary Elwes.

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: A troubled Navy recruit is prone to violent outbursts and is ordered to see a psychiatrist, who gradually helps the mentally scarred sailor to come to terms with his past and abusive childhood. Fact-based drama, directed by and starring Denzel Washington. With Derek Luke, Joy Bryant and Salli Richardson.

programme.title: Custody
programme.desc: Three women are brought together when a hard-working single mother has her children taken away. Courtroom drama, starring Viola Davis and Hayden Panettiere.

programme.title: Cafe Society
programme.desc: In the 1930s, a Bronx youngster heads to Hollywood and falls for the beautiful secretary of his powerful agent uncle. Woody Allen's romantic comedy, starring Steve Carell, Jesse Eisenberg and Kristen Stewart.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the ill-fated 1970 Apollo 13 mission to the moon. Crew leader Jim Lovell is faced with a nightmare when the mission suffers an on-board explosion - leaving the team stranded in space with a dwindling oxygen supply while flight controllers and engineers in Houston try to find a way to bring the crew safely back to Earth. With Tom Hanks, Kevin Bacon, Bill Paxton, Ed Harris and Gary Sinise.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Far and Away
programme.desc: Penniless Irish farmer Joseph seeks revenge on the cruel landowner who drove him from his home. However, the landlord's daughter, desperate to escape her family, persuades him to join her in seeking their fortune in America. The pair plan to stake a claim in the Oklahoma gold rush, but instead Joseph is forced to become a bare-knuckle fighter to support them. Romantic drama set in the 1890s, starring Tom Cruise and Nicole Kidman.

programme.title: Apollo 13
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the ill-fated 1970 Apollo 13 mission to the moon. Crew leader Jim Lovell is faced with a nightmare when the mission suffers an on-board explosion - leaving the team stranded in space with a dwindling oxygen supply while flight controllers and engineers in Houston try to find a way to bring the crew safely back to Earth. With Tom Hanks, Kevin Bacon, Bill Paxton, Ed Harris and Gary Sinise.

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: Biographical drama concerning the actions of US pilot Chesley 'Sully' Sullenberger, whose January 2009 emergency landing of US Airways Flight 1549 on the Hudson River caught the imagination of the world. Starring Tom Hanks, Aaron Eckhart and Laura Linney, and directed by Clint Eastwood.

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: The story of Christine Chubbuck, a Florida-based local news reporter who committed suicide live on air in 1974. Biopic, starring Rebecca Hall, Michael C Hall and Tracy Letts.(n)

programme.title: The Verdict
programme.desc: A failed attorney takes on a medical case on behalf of the family of a woman left in a coma after an operation in a Catholic hospital. Hoping to earn his fee as fast as possible, he advises both sides to settle out of court. However, soon it becomes clear that the hospital is negligent, and he resolves to bring those responsible to justice. Sidney Lumet's drama, with Paul Newman, Charlotte Rampling and James Mason.(n)

programme.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
programme.desc: Lounge singers Lorelei and Dorothy embark on a transatlantic cruise to Paris in search of rich husbands. While Dorothy falls for a penniless man, Lorelei thinks she has found the millionaire of her dreams, only for his father to hire a private eye to spy on her and prove she is a gold-digger. Howard Hawks' musical comedy, starring Marilyn Monroe, Jane Russell, Charles Coburn and Elliott Reid.(n)

programme.title: Frankie & Alice
programme.desc: A black dancer develops multiple personality disorder, with one of her alter egos an angry white racist from the Deep South. With the help of a psychiatrist, she delves into her past in the hope of identifying the childhood trauma that has caused her condition. Fact-based drama, starring Halle Berry and Stellan Skarsgard.(n)

programme.title: I'll See You in My Dreams
programme.desc: A retired widow leads a quiet life, but when her dog dies, she finds herself feeling unfulfilled, and decides she needs to broaden her horizons with fresh experiences. She strikes up a friendship with a handyman, and reluctantly attends a speed dating event, where she becomes open to the possibility of a new romance. Comedy drama, starring Blythe Danner, Martin Starr, Sam Elliott and Malin Akerman.(n)

programme.title: Maudie
programme.desc: An arthritic Nova Scotia woman works as a housekeeper while she hones her skills as an artist. Eventually she becomes a beloved figure in the community. Fact based romantic drama, starring Sally Hawkins, Ethan Hawke and Zachary Bennett.(n)

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: An airline pilot with a history of heavy drinking and drug use successfully lands a plane that suffers mechanical problems during a fierce storm, saving the lives of nearly everyone on board. While initially hailed as a hero, it later emerges that he was drunk at the time, raising questions about whether he may have contributed to the disaster rather than averted it. Drama, starring Denzel Washington and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.title: The Beguiled
programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German Army, and wait for evacuation during a fierce battle in the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's drama, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy and Mark Rylance.(n)

programme.title: Flight
programme.desc: An airline pilot with a history of heavy drinking and drug use successfully lands a plane that suffers mechanical problems during a fierce storm, saving the lives of nearly everyone on board. While initially hailed as a hero, it later emerges that he was drunk at the time, raising questions about whether he may have contributed to the disaster rather than averted it. Drama, starring Denzel Washington and Don Cheadle.(n)

programme.desc: The arrival of a wounded Civil War soldier brings jealousy and betrayal to a Southern girls' school. Period drama, starring Colin Farrell, Nicole Kidman and Kirsten Dunst.(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Empire and France are surrounded by the German Army, and wait for evacuation during a fierce battle in the Second World War. Christopher Nolan's drama, starring Kenneth Branagh, Tom Hardy and Mark Rylance.(n)

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind, hard-drinking war veteran pays a timid college student to accompany him on a weekend break in the big city, where he plans to make the most of life. However, the youngster is shocked to learn that at the end of their trip, his new friend plans to kill himself. Comedy drama, starring an Oscar-winning Al Pacino, Chris O'Donnell, Gabrielle Anwar and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmate's five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role.

programme.title: 50 First Dates
programme.desc: A vet working at a Hawaiian zoo falls madly in love with a beautiful woman and pulls out all the stops to romance her. However, his attempts to woo her are seriously undermined by the fact that she suffers from short-term memory-loss, meaning he has to resume his courtship from scratch every day. Romantic comedy, starring Drew Barrymore, Adam Sandler, Rob Schneider and Dan Aykroyd.

programme.title: The Waterboy
programme.desc: An American football team's waterboy puts up with constant ridicule from the players. But one day his anger gets the better of him and he demonstrates an unexpected talent for tackling - so the coach gives him a chance to prove his worth on the pitch. However, he has to keep his blossoming sporting career a secret from his overprotective mother. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Kathy Bates, Henry Winkler and Fairuza Balk.

programme.title: Big Daddy
programme.desc: An immature 32-year-old is heartbroken when his girlfriend walks out on him. In a plan to win her back, he volunteers to look after his flatmate's five-year-old son, thus demonstrating he is finally ready to grow up. However, his ideas of childcare prove unconventional and chaos quickly ensues. Comedy, with Adam Sandler, Joey Lauren Adams, Jon Stewart, Josh Mostel, Leslie Mann, Rob Schneider and Kristy Swanson, alongside Steve Buscemi in a cameo role.

programme.title: The Top Ten Show
programme.desc: Which movies are doing the best business at home and across the pond? Clips from the UK and US Top Ten show you the best of what's on offer on the big screen.

programme.title: The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: A single TV producer is appalled when a chauvinistic presenter is hired for her morning news show. However, she is forced to seek his help when she meets the man of her dreams, and begins testing his theories on what men find attractive. Romantic comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Katherine Heigl, Bree Turner and Eric Winter.

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage.

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for an annual festival, sisterhoods are rekindled and wild sides are rediscovered. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith.

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.

programme.title: Mean Girls
programme.desc: A teenager is surprised when she is befriended by the girls in the most popular clique at her new school. However, a dating mishap leads to trouble and her supposed friends start to turn on her. Urged on by other pals outside their circle, the newcomer resolves to bring down the self-appointed queen of campus - only to end up adopting some of her rival's crueller characteristics. Comedy, with Lindsay Lohan, Rachel McAdams, Tina Fey and Lacey Chabert.

programme.title: Clueless
programme.desc: A rich high-school student uses all her charm and financial clout to boost an awkward new pupil's image, but soon finds she has created a monster - while her own popularity suffers in the process. Comedy inspired by Jane Austen's Emma, starring Alicia Silverstone, Stacey Dash, Brittany Murphy and Paul Rudd.

programme.title: Moana: Special
programme.desc: A look at the animated Disney adventure featuring the voices of Dwayne Johnson and Jemaine Clement.

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them: Special
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the latest trip into JK Rowling's wizarding world, including interviews with stars Eddie Redmayne and Colin Farrell.

programme.title: The Back-up Plan
programme.desc: A thirtysomething single woman fears she may never have children and decides to undergo artificial insemination. However, shortly after leaving the clinic, she meets the man of her dreams but must decide how to break the news she may shortly be pregnant. Romantic comedy, starring Jennifer Lopez, Alex O'Loughlin, Michaela Watkins, Eric Christian Olsen and Anthony Anderson.

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: When her husband dies of leukaemia, a Women's Institute member is inspired to raise funds for the local hospital. Casting inhibitions and clothes aside, the widow and her daring friend encourage their fellow members to pose nude for a charity calendar, causing a stir in their Yorkshire village and beyond. Nigel Cole's fact-based comedy drama, starring Helen Mirren, Julie Walters, Annette Crosbie, Celia Imrie and Penelope Wilton.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: A female journalist sets out to demonstrate how women manage to put off prospective partners, and spies the perfect man on whom to test her theories. However, the experiment takes an unexpected turn thanks to her guinea pig, who has a hidden agenda of his own. Romantic comedy, starring Kate Hudson, Matthew McConaughey, Adam Goldberg and Michael Michele.

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Three former college friends reunite at the funeral of a mutual acquaintance, who killed herself after her husband left her for a younger woman. Finding themselves in a similar situation, the trio decide to take action and hit their former partners where it hurts most - their finances. Comedy, starring Goldie Hawn, Bette Midler, Diane Keaton, Maggie Smith, Dan Hedaya, Bronson Pinchot and Elizabeth Berkley.

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: When her husband dies of leukaemia, a Women's Institute member is inspired to raise funds for the local hospital. Casting inhibitions and clothes aside, the widow and her daring friend encourage their fellow members to pose nude for a charity calendar, causing a stir in their Yorkshire village and beyond. Nigel Cole's fact-based comedy drama, starring Helen Mirren, Julie Walters, Annette Crosbie, Celia Imrie and Penelope Wilton.

programme.title: Bridget Jones's Baby
programme.desc: After a pair of one-night stands, the now single Bridget Jones winds up pregnant. Is the dad old flame Mark Darcy or US dating guru Jack Qwant? Comedy sequel, starring Renee Zellweger, Colin Firth and Patrick Dempsey.

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days
programme.desc: A female journalist sets out to demonstrate how women manage to put off prospective partners, and spies the perfect man on whom to test her theories. However, the experiment takes an unexpected turn thanks to her guinea pig, who has a hidden agenda of his own. Romantic comedy, starring Kate Hudson, Matthew McConaughey, Adam Goldberg and Michael Michele.(n)

programme.title: The First Wives Club
programme.desc: Three former college friends reunite at the funeral of a mutual acquaintance, who killed herself after her husband left her for a younger woman. Finding themselves in a similar situation, the trio decide to take action and hit their former partners where it hurts most - their finances. Comedy, starring Goldie Hawn, Bette Midler, Diane Keaton, Maggie Smith, Dan Hedaya, Bronson Pinchot and Elizabeth Berkley.(n)

programme.title: Date Night
programme.desc: A married couple stuck in a rut try to liven up their relationship with a romantic evening at a popular New York restaurant. They manage to sneak in by claiming someone else's reservation - but the people whose table they take are in debt to gangsters, and hitmen are soon on their trail. Comedy, starring Tina Fey, Steve Carell and Mark Wahlberg.(n)

programme.title: It Had to Be You
programme.desc: A commitment-shy jingle writer runs for the hills when her boyfriend proposes. Romantic comedy, starring Cristin Milioti, Dan Soder and Halley Feiffer.(n)

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Three downtrodden female office employees grow fed up with their chauvinistic boss, and spend hours daydreaming about getting their own back. Unexpectedly their fantasies become reality when a series of comic mishaps results in their kidnapping him - and teaching him a long-overdue lesson. Comedy, starring Dolly Parton, Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin and Dabney Coleman.(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick.(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.(n)

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: The Boss
programme.desc: Disgraced entrepreneur Michelle Darnell attempts to launch a comeback with the reluctant help of Claire Rawlings, her former PA. Comedy, starring Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Bell and Peter Dinklage.(n)

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Three downtrodden female office employees grow fed up with their chauvinistic boss, and spend hours daydreaming about getting their own back. Unexpectedly their fantasies become reality when a series of comic mishaps results in their kidnapping him - and teaching him a long-overdue lesson. Comedy, starring Dolly Parton, Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin and Dabney Coleman.(n)

programme.title: Table 19
programme.desc: Dumped by the best man via text, a former maid of honour decides to pitch up at her friend's wedding anyway. Comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Craig Robinson and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
programme.desc: Calamity ensues when two party-loving brothers attempt to find respectable dates for their sister's Hawaii wedding. Comedy, starring Zac Efron and Anna Kendrick.(n)

programme.title: Snatched
programme.desc: After being dumped by her boyfriend before their holiday, Emily Middleton takes her cautious mother Linda with her to Ecuador. However, their lives are soon turned upside down when the pair are kidnapped. Fish-out-of-water comedy, starring Amy Schumer, Goldie Hawn and Joan Cusack.(n)

programme.title: Bridesmaids
programme.desc: A disorganised woman is asked to be maid of honour at her best friend's wedding. Taking charge of the prenuptial bridal celebrations, she resolves to give her pal and accompanying bridesmaids the time of their lives, but as her efforts slide into chaos she finds the wife of the groom's boss is keen to usurp her position. Comedy, with Kristen Wiig, Rose Byrne and Melissa McCarthy.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: A New Orleans detective's girlfriend is kidnapped by a vengeful criminal mastermind, who sets him a sadistic challenge. To save her, the cop must successfully complete a series of 12 death-defying challenges that send him on a dangerous race through the city. Action thriller, with John Cena, Aidan Gillen and Ashley Scott.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle
programme.desc: The high-kicking trio return, this time to hunt down the villains responsible for stealing two encoded rings containing top-secret information. The case brings them into conflict with a former Angel gone bad, a spurned ex-lover out for revenge and their creepy old enemy the Thin Man. Action adventure sequel, starring Drew Barrymore, Cameron Diaz and Lucy Liu, with Demi Moore, John Cleese and Bernie Mac.

programme.title: A Shot in the Dark
programme.desc: The bungling Inspector Clouseau is sent to investigate a high-profile murder case. All the clues point to a maid being the guilty party, but the accident-prone detective is instantly smitten with her, and devotes his efforts to proving her innocence - despite all evidence to the contrary. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers, Elke Sommer, George Sanders and Herbert Lom.

programme.title: Spider-Man 3
programme.desc: A sinister alien parasite brings out the web-slinging hero's darker side, filling him with thoughts of revenge on his uncle's murderer, the shape-shifting Sandman. Meanwhile, he also has to contend with the challenge of his best friend following in his father's villainous footsteps - and a jealous rival developing superpowers of his own. Superhero sequel, with Tobey Maguire, Kirsten Dunst and James Franco.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: An Amazon princess leaves home to fight in the First World War. Aside from falling for the dashing pilot she helped save, Diana Prince realises there is more to the enemy than meets the eye. Fantasy adventure, starring Gal Gadot, Chris Pine and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: A mystical artefact is stolen from a top-secret military base by Thor's brother Loki, who plans to use it to bring about an alien invasion. Spymaster Nick Fury brings together a team of superheroes, including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America and the Hulk, to defend Earth from the impending attack. Action adventure uniting the Marvel comic-book characters, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Tom Hiddleston, Jeremy Renner and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: After discovering an ancient tomb in Iraq, adventurer Nick Morton is haunted by a resurrected ancient Egyptian princess who wreaks havoc on modern-day England. Could a shady British doctor be the key to unlocking the mystery? Thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Annabelle Wallis, Sofia Boutella and Russell Crowe.

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Years after being humiliated as a student, rogue CIA agent Robbie Wheirdicht turns to old classmate Calvin Joyner for help when he's targeted by his own organisation. Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan.

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: An Amazon princess leaves home to fight in the First World War. Aside from falling for the dashing pilot she helped save, Diana Prince realises there is more to the enemy than meets the eye. Fantasy adventure, starring Gal Gadot, Chris Pine and David Thewlis.

programme.title: Avengers Assemble
programme.desc: A mystical artefact is stolen from a top-secret military base by Thor's brother Loki, who plans to use it to bring about an alien invasion. Spymaster Nick Fury brings together a team of superheroes, including Iron Man, Thor, Captain America and the Hulk, to defend Earth from the impending attack. Action adventure uniting the Marvel comic-book characters, starring Robert Downey Jr, Chris Evans, Chris Hemsworth, Mark Ruffalo, Scarlett Johansson, Tom Hiddleston, Jeremy Renner and Samuel L Jackson.

programme.title: The Mummy
programme.desc: After discovering an ancient tomb in Iraq, adventurer Nick Morton is haunted by a resurrected ancient Egyptian princess who wreaks havoc on modern-day England. Could a shady British doctor be the key to unlocking the mystery? Thriller, starring Tom Cruise, Annabelle Wallis, Sofia Boutella and Russell Crowe.

programme.title: Desperado
programme.desc: A mysterious musician carrying a guitar case full of firearms turns up in a small backwoods town to exact revenge on the drugs baron who killed his girlfriend and permanently injured his hand. Robert Rodriguez's action thriller, starring Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Cheech Marin, Joaquim de Almeida, Steve Buscemi and Quentin Tarantino.

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on the Sky Cinema channels, plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Mr Right
programme.desc: A woman falls for what she thinks is an ideal guy, but he turns out to be a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him. Action comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Sam Rockwell and Tim Roth.

programme.title: Aeon Flux
programme.desc: Scientists create a futuristic police state, but political assassinations and corruption provoke an acrobatic rebel agent to seek revenge on those in charge. Sci-fi martial arts thriller, based on the animated series, with Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Frances McDormand, Jonny Lee Miller and Sophie Okonedo.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow sets sail in search of the legendary fountain of youth. His mission puts him up against a mysterious woman from his past, old enemy Barbossa, now in the employ of the British Navy, and the most feared pirate of them all, the dreaded Blackbeard. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Penelope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush and Ian McShane.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: A mercenary is pulled into a centuries-old battle between Chinese warriors and giant, lizard-like monsters. Fantasy adventure, starring Matt Damon, Willem Dafoe and Tian Jing.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman.

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow sets sail in search of the legendary fountain of youth. His mission puts him up against a mysterious woman from his past, old enemy Barbossa, now in the employ of the British Navy, and the most feared pirate of them all, the dreaded Blackbeard. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Penelope Cruz, Geoffrey Rush and Ian McShane.

programme.title: The Dark Tower
programme.desc: A young lad is transported to a parallel universe where he is caught in a battle between a mysterious gunslinger and a sinister sorcerer. Fantasy adventure based on the Stephen King novels, starring Idris Elba, Matthew McConaughey and Tom Taylor.

programme.title: The Great Wall
programme.desc: A mercenary is pulled into a centuries-old battle between Chinese warriors and giant, lizard-like monsters. Fantasy adventure, starring Matt Damon, Willem Dafoe and Tian Jing.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman.

programme.desc: Scientists create a futuristic police state, but political assassinations and corruption provoke an acrobatic rebel agent to seek revenge on those in charge. Sci-fi martial arts thriller, based on the animated series, with Charlize Theron, Marton Csokas, Frances McDormand, Jonny Lee Miller and Sophie Okonedo.(n)

programme.title: Mr Right
programme.desc: A woman falls for what she thinks is an ideal guy, but he turns out to be a hitman on the run from the crime cartels who employ him. Action comedy, starring Anna Kendrick, Sam Rockwell and Tim Roth.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the films now playing on the Sky Cinema channels, plus other highlights showing on Sky.(n)

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: More than 400 Korean workers risk their lives to escape from a forced labour camp on the island of Hashima in southern Japan. Period drama, starring Jung-min Hwang, Ji-seob So and Joong-Ki Song.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: After the USS Enterprise is attacked during a rescue mission, Kirk, Spock and the crew struggle for survival on an alien planet while their mysterious assailant carries out his plans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: The Battleship Island
programme.desc: More than 400 Korean workers risk their lives to escape from a forced labour camp on the island of Hashima in southern Japan. Period drama, starring Jung-min Hwang, Ji-seob So and Joong-Ki Song.(n)

A scientist learns the world is soon to face a global cataclysm that will wipe out the human race, but finds the US president has plans to secretly save a fraction of the population, leaving everyone else to die. A writer learns of this scheme, and as the world is devastated by earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, he tries to get his family to the last safe refuge. Disaster movie, with John Cusack and Chiwetel Ejiofor.(n)

programme.title: Doctor Strange
programme.desc: An American surgeon seeks help from mystics after his hands are damaged in a car crash, but winds up becoming a warrior in an inter-dimensional battle between the forces of light and darkness. Fantasy adventure based on the Marvel comic, starring Benedict Cumberbatch, Mads Mikkelsen and Rachel McAdams.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek Beyond
programme.desc: After the USS Enterprise is attacked during a rescue mission, Kirk, Spock and the crew struggle for survival on an alien planet while their mysterious assailant carries out his plans. Sci-fi adventure, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Machete
programme.desc: A Mexican cop-turned-mercenary is hired by a shadowy businessman to assassinate a politician. When he realises his employers have double-crossed him, he joins forces with a band of militant illegal immigrants to seek a suitably bloody revenge. Action thriller, starring Danny Trejo, Robert De Niro and Jessica Alba.(n)

programme.title: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
programme.desc: Retired bank robber John Doherty escapes a gunman with the aid of a young car thief, and together they go in search of the loot from the former crook's last job. When they discover the stash is missing - and John's thuggish old partners are also looking for it - the pair decide to do a repeat robbery. Comedy drama, starring Clint Eastwood, Jeff Bridges, George Kennedy and Geoffrey Lewis.

programme.title: Easy Rider
programme.desc: Two hippie bikers travel across America on their way to the Mardi Gras in New Orleans. In their quest to find a different way of living, they encounter other similarly nonconformist souls, including a disillusioned lawyer who ends up travelling with them, but also come up against bigotry and intolerance. Drama, directed by and starring Dennis Hopper, with Peter Fonda, Jack Nicholson and Phil Spector.

programme.title: High Noon
programme.desc: A town marshal is torn between love and duty on his wedding day as he prepares for the arrival of a vengeful adversary on the midday train. Meanwhile, the townsfolk the marshal has so loyally protected are certain he will be killed in the confrontation and abandon him one by one to face his enemy alone. Western, starring Gary Cooper, Grace Kelly, Lloyd Bridges and Lee Van Cleef.

programme.title: The Way We Were
programme.desc: Upper-class novelist Hubbell Gardiner and Jewish political activist Katie Morosky meet at college in the 1930s and later marry. Although very much in love, their opposing political outlooks lead to conflict when Hubbell's successful career as a Hollywood screenwriter is compromised by his wife's socialist leanings. As the 1950s dawn it becomes clear their differences are too great to overcome. Romantic drama, with Robert Redford, Barbra Streisand, Bradford Dillman and Murray Hamilton.

programme.title: Anna and the King of Siam
programme.desc: A widowed English schoolteacher begins a relationship with the powerful monarch of Siam while tutoring his 67 children. Romantic drama, starring Irene Dunne, Rex Harrison and Lee J Cobb.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins.

programme.title: El Dorado
programme.desc: An ageing gunfighter is drawn into the conflict between a land-grabbing cattle baron and a ranching family, but gets wounded in the process. A year later, he returns to town to find the situation has not improved - so along with his sidekick and the drunken town sheriff, he fights to defend the family from its enemies. Western, starring John Wayne, Robert Mitchum, James Caan and Ed Asner.

programme.title: The Hustler
programme.desc: An arrogant pool shark challenges a renowned champion player, only to lose the match and end up broke with his confidence shattered. With the aid of a cut-throat manager, he sets about honing his skills for a rematch - but making it to the top could cost him everything. Oscar-winning drama, starring Paul Newman, Jackie Gleason, George C Scott, Piper Laurie, Murray Hamilton and Myron McCormick.

programme.title: Airplane
programme.desc: The passengers on board an ill-fated airliner become increasingly jittery when the flight crew flounder during a food-poisoning crisis. As ground control personnel struggle heroically to ensure the plane lands safely, a traumatised war veteran must face his fear to take the controls. Spoof disaster movie, starring Robert Hays, Leslie Nielsen, Robert Stack and Lloyd Bridges.

programme.title: The Bridge on the River Kwai
programme.desc: A British colonel in a Japanese PoW camp is ordered to build a railway bridge over a river, forging a vital communications link. At first he refuses to obey, but eventually agrees to take the project on - and becomes so obsessed with the task that he creates a dilemma for an American soldier sent to destroy the structure. David Lean's Oscar-winning Second World War drama, starring Alec Guinness, William Holden and Jack Hawkins.

programme.title: Midnight Express
programme.desc: An American student is arrested for drug smuggling while on holiday in Turkey, and thrown into a brutal prison ruled by a sadistic warder. His family and the US government plan an appeal, but he begins to realise that diplomatic efforts are fruitless, and his only hope is to plot a desperate escape. Alan Parker's fact-based drama, starring Brad Davis, John Hurt and Randy Quaid.

programme.title: The Birds
programme.desc: A San Francisco socialite takes a shine to a man she meets by chance, and follows him home to a Californian coastal community. Her arrival coincides with a series of mysterious attacks on people by birds, which soon escalates as vast flocks go on the warpath. Alfred Hitchcock's thriller, based on a Daphne du Maurier short story, starring Tippi Hedren, Rod Taylor, Suzanne Pleshette, Jessica Tandy and Veronica Cartwright.

programme.title: Raging Bull
programme.desc: Biopic of boxer Jake LaMotta, who rose to fame as the world middleweight champion in the 1940s. His career was marred by an inability to deal with his anger, leaving his family bearing the brunt of his rage and paranoia. Directed by Martin Scorsese and starring an Oscar-winning Robert De Niro alongside Joe Pesci and Cathy Moriarty.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Outlaws hold staff and a passenger and her baby hostage at a remote stagecoach station while awaiting the arrival of a shipment of $100,000 in gold bullion. The nervous captives try to stay calm, but the tension between the gang leader and a jumpy henchman grows fraught, ending in a frantic shoot-out - with the infant in the thick of the fray. Western, starring Tyrone Power, Susan Hayward and Jack Elam.

programme.title: The Ox-Bow Incident
programme.desc: Cowboys intervene in a bid to prevent the lynching of three men accused of murdering a rancher and stealing his cattle. Western drama, starring Henry Fonda, Henry Morgan and Anthony Quinn.

programme.title: How Green Was My Valley
programme.desc: Residents of a Welsh mining community at the start of the 20th century struggle to come to terms with the decline in their traditional way of life. Oscar-winning drama, starring Walter Pidgeon, Maureen O'Hara, Donald Crisp and Roddy McDowall.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: A wage-slave in his uncle's factory has big ambitions. Just as he comes close to marrying a wealthy socialite, a poor working-class girl with whom he had a brief, casual affair tells him she is pregnant with his child. When she threatens to disclose the truth, he makes a series of decisions which bring terrible consequences in their wake. Oscar-winning drama, starring Montgomery Clift, Shelley Winters, Elizabeth Taylor,and Raymond Burr.

programme.title: Kramer vs Kramer
programme.desc: Ted Kramer takes stock of his life and decides to devote all his time and energy to raising his seven-year-old boy after his wife walks out on them. Things go well for the pair - until she makes an unexpected reappearance and demands sole custody of the child, a move that threatens to tear father and son apart. Oscar-winning drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Meryl Streep, Justin Henry, Jane Alexander, JoBeth Williams and Howard Duff.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: A cockney lothario leads a charmed life, enjoying casual sex with as many women as possible with no thought of the consequences. However, a series of unexpected setbacks forces him to finally take stock of his life. Comedy drama based on the play by Bill Naughton, starring Michael Caine, Jane Asher, Millicent Martin, Shirley Anne Field, Shelley Winters and Denholm Elliott.

programme.title: To Sir, with Love
programme.desc: A black engineer takes a teaching job at a tough London school to make ends meet, and over the course of his difficult first term, struggles to gain the respect of his disruptive pupils. Drama, starring Sidney Poitier, Christian Roberts, Judy Geeson, Geoffrey Bayldon, Patricia Routledge, Christopher Chittell and Lulu.

programme.title: The Sons of Katie Elder
programme.desc: Four brothers are reunited at their mother's funeral and discover their father was swindled out of his farm and subsequently murdered. However, as they set about avenging his death and reclaiming his land, a crook frames them for killing the sheriff. Western, starring John Wayne, Dean Martin, Earl Holliman, Michael Anderson Jr, James Gregory, George Kennedy and Dennis Hopper.

programme.title: Kramer vs Kramer
programme.desc: Ted Kramer takes stock of his life and decides to devote all his time and energy to raising his seven-year-old boy after his wife walks out on them. Things go well for the pair - until she makes an unexpected reappearance and demands sole custody of the child, a move that threatens to tear father and son apart. Oscar-winning drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Meryl Streep, Justin Henry, Jane Alexander, JoBeth Williams and Howard Duff.

programme.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
programme.desc: Scientists detect a mysterious black monolith on the moon is transmitting a signal to Jupiter. A spacecraft is sent on a mission to investigate the origins of the strange object, but as they near their destination, the astronauts realise the computer controlling the ship is turning against them. Stanley Kubrick's sci-fi epic, with Keir Dullea, William Sylvester, Gary Lockwood and Leonard Rossiter.

programme.title: High Plains Drifter
programme.desc: A mysterious stranger is hired to defend a remote frontier town from three outlaws who are making people's lives a misery. Although he rids the community of the troublemakers, the residents' lives take a turn for the worse as their saviour seizes control of the town and seeks to punish them for their past sins. Western, directed by and starring Clint Eastwood, alongside Verna Bloom and Marianna Hill.(n)

programme.title: Five Easy Pieces
programme.desc: An oil-rigger who has cut himself off from his cultured, middle-class roots reluctantly returns to his family home, with his pregnant girlfriend in tow, after receiving word that his father is dying. However, the homecoming turns into a failure, as the psychological journey has a lasting impact on himself and those closest to him. Drama, with Jack Nicholson, Karen Black, Susan Anspach and Ralph Waite.(n)

programme.title: Our Man Flint
programme.desc: The world is rocked by a series of mysterious ecological disasters, while top secret agents from all nations are being murdered. Super-cool American spy Derek Flint is soon on the case, and discovers a fiendish organisation using a weather-controlling machine to hold the world to ransom. Comedy adventure, with James Coburn, Lee J Cobb and Gina Golan.(n)

programme.title: Hello, Dolly
programme.desc: A widowed matchmaker sets about finding a new wife for a grain merchant whose spouse has died. However, she has secretly fallen in love with the man herself, and hatches an elaborate plan to marry him. Musical set in late 19th-century New York, starring Barbra Streisand, Walter Matthau, Michael Crawford and Marianne McAndrew, and featuring Louis Armstrong's performance of the title number.(n)

programme.title: The Desert Rats
programme.desc: A Scottish army officer is placed in command of a unit of Australian troops given the task of defending Tobruk against overwhelming German forces, led by the renowned general Rommel. Second World War adventure, starring Richard Burton, Robert Newton and James Mason, reprising his role as Rommel from The Desert Fox.(n)

programme.title: An Affair to Remember
programme.desc: Love blossoms on the high seas for a playboy bachelor and a former nightclub singer during a transatlantic cruise. When the liner comes into dock at New York, they agree to wait for six months and then meet again at the Empire State Building, hoping to prove to each other their relationship is more than a shipboard affair. Romantic drama, with Cary Grant, Deborah Kerr, Cathleen Nesbitt, Richard Denning and Neva Patterson.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Dog Day Afternoon
programme.desc: Hapless Sonny and his sidekick Sal have a plan to rob a Brooklyn bank. The novice crooks thought they would be in and out in 10 minutes, but instead find themselves stuck in an ongoing hostage situation, with the police and the media laying siege to the bank. Sidney Lumet's fact-based drama, starring Al Pacino, John Cazale and Charles Durning.(n)

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: A bored millionaire masterminds a bank robbery, only to find himself pursued by a glamorous insurance investigator determined to prove his guilt. It is not long before they get embroiled in a passionate affair - but conflicting interests mean they can never really trust one another. Crime drama, starring Steve McQueen, Faye Dunaway, Paul Burke and Yaphet Kotto.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: The most rebellious Allied prisoners of war are sent to a supposedly escape-proof maximum-security detention camp during the Second World War. They plan an ingenious mass breakout by digging a tunnel, but even when free of the camp, making it across occupied Europe proves a dangerous journey. Drama, starring Steve McQueen, James Coburn, Donald Pleasence, James Garner, Charles Bronson and Richard Attenborough.(n)

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: Maverick San Francisco detective `Dirty' Harry Callahan sets out to capture a deranged sniper picking off victims at random. Although his own tactics barely stay within the confines of the law, he is determined the killer will face his particular brand of justice, regardless of his superiors' disapproval. Don Siegel's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, Harry Guardino and Andy Robinson.(n)

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Maverick cop Dirty Harry Callahan antagonises his superiors once more in his pursuit of a vigilante group responsible for murdering the city's most wanted criminals. However, he is unaware that the killers are some of his fellow officers - and are prepared to see him dead to keep their secret safe. Action thriller sequel, starring Clint Eastwood, Hal Holbrook, Mitchell Ryan, David Soul and Robert Urich.(n)

programme.title: The Story of Robin Hood and His Merrie Men
programme.desc: A noble archer attends a royal contest, but on the way home his father is murdered by henchmen of the wicked King John. He assumes the life of an outlaw, gathering a band of followers in Sherwood Forest and fighting to bring justice to the over-taxed poor and avenge his father's death. Adventure, starring Richard Todd, Joan Rice and Peter Finch.

programme.title: 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea
programme.desc: A Victorian scientist investigating the mysterious sinking of whaling ships in the Pacific falls overboard during an attack on his vessel. Along with a veteran mariner and a diver, he is picked up and taken captive by Captain Nemo and whisked away on a series of adventures in his futuristic submarine. Disney fantasy, based on Jules Verne's novel, starring Kirk Douglas, James Mason, Paul Lukas and Peter Lorre.

programme.title: Atlantis 2: Milo's Return
programme.desc: Animated adventure sequel in which the intrepid scientist - reunited with his old friends - investigates a series of strange events around the world. However, his exploration leads him into a confrontation with a fearsome sea monster. With the voices of James Arnold Taylor and Cree Summer.

programme.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
programme.desc: A map-maker dreams of locating the lost continent of Atlantis - and gets his chance when an eccentric billionaire invites him to join a team of intrepid explorers. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michael J Fox, James Garner, Jim Varney and Leonard Nimoy.

programme.title: Monsters University
programme.desc: Student creatures Mike and Sulley attend university to learn how to be scary, but their rivalry gets them both kicked off the course. The monstrous duo must learn how to work together if they are to realise their dreams of terrifying children. Animated comedy prequel, with the voices of John Goodman, Billy Crystal and Helen Mirren.

programme.title: Planes
programme.desc: A crop duster longs to be a racing plane, but is hamstrung by a fear of heights. With the aid of a veteran flyer, he learns to conquer his phobia and compete against some of the world's greatest flyers in a round-the-world race. Animated adventure spin-off from Pixar's Cars, with the voices of Dane Cook, Teri Hatcher and Stacy Keach.

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.

programme.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire
programme.desc: A map-maker dreams of locating the lost continent of Atlantis - and gets his chance when an eccentric billionaire invites him to join a team of intrepid explorers. Animated adventure, with the voices of Michael J Fox, James Garner, Jim Varney and Leonard Nimoy.

programme.title: Hocus Pocus
programme.desc: A teenager in Salem, Massachusetts, breaks into a spooky house on Halloween and accidentally resurrects three witches who have been dead for 300 years. The sorceresses are soon causing chaos while seeking a suitable sacrifice for a ritual to give them eternal youth. However, an old foe - a boy they turned into a cat - is on hand to help stop their mischief. Supernatural Disney comedy, with Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy and Omri Katz.

The sorceresses are soon causing chaos while seeking a suitable sacrifice for a ritual to give them eternal youth. However, an old foe - a boy they turned into a cat - is on hand to help stop their mischief. Supernatural Disney comedy, with Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy and Omri Katz.

programme.title: The News Boys
programme.desc: Newspaper delivery boys in 19th-century New York rely on their meagre earnings to support their impoverished families. When media mogul Joseph Pulitzer raises his prices, threatening the livelihoods of the youngsters, they organise into a union to force him to put people's lives ahead of his own profits. Fact-based musical, starring Robert Duvall, Christian Bale and Ann-Margret.

programme.title: The Great Muppet Caper
programme.desc: Reporters Kermit the Frog and Fozzie Bear are sacked for missing out on a massive scoop about the theft of jewellery from famous British fashion designer Lady Holiday. To try to re-establish their reputations, the duo and Gonzo fly to London to see if they can track down the culprit. Comedy, with the voices of Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with cameo appearances by John Cleese, Diana Rigg, Charles Grodin and Peter Ustinov.

programme.title: The Little Mermaid II: Return to the Sea
programme.desc: An evil sea-witch called Morgana sets her sights on King Triton's trident and decides to use Ariel's daughter to get her wrinkly hands on it. Animated sequel, with the voices of Jodi Benson, Sam Wright, Tara Charendoff, Pat Carroll and Buddy Hackett.

programme.title: Little Mermaid: Ariel's Beginning
programme.desc: The underwater princess is devastated when her mother is captured by pirates, but with the aid of her sea creature friends, sets off on a rescue mission. She also has to convince her father to renounce his decision to ban singing in his kingdom. Animated prequel, with the voice of Jodi Benson, Sally Field and Lorelei Hill Butters.

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.

programme.title: Moana
programme.desc: To save her island home from a terrible curse, a brave Polynesian teenager must set sail and journey into the great blue yonder with the aid of a legendary hero. Disney animation, with the voices of Dwayne Johnson, Auli'i Cravalho, Rachel House and Temuera Morrison.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: A bookish woman agrees to take her father's place as prisoner of a fearsome monster living in a castle deep in the forest. She gradually grows to see a gentler, more human side to her hideous host, and comes to realise she may be able to break the curse that turned him into a beast in the first place. Disney animated fantasy, with the voices of Paige O'Hara and Robby Benson.

programme.title: Freaky Friday
programme.desc: A mother and her rebellious teenage daughter's simultaneous wishes to trade places results in them magically switching bodies for a day and gaining an unforgettable insight into each other's lives. Disney fantasy comedy, with Jodie Foster, Barbara Harris, Patsy Kelly, John Astin, Charlene Tilton and Sorrell Booke.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: The adventures of the legendary outlaw and Sherwood Forest's band of heroes as they rob the rich to feed the poor, while evil Prince John hatches a cunning plan to exact revenge and finish off the brigands. Disney animation, with the voices of Terry-Thomas, Peter Ustinov, Phil Harris, Brian Bedford and Monica Evans.

programme.title: Finding Dory
programme.desc: Nemo and dad Marlin set out on an underwater adventure to help their forgetful friend Dory find her parents. Animated sequel, with the voices of Ellen DeGeneres, Albert Brooks and Ed O'Neill.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast

Disney animation, with the voices of Terry-Thomas, Peter Ustinov, Phil Harris, Brian Bedford and Monica Evans.

programme.title: Heavyweights
programme.desc: Shy, overweight kids look forward to their annual holiday together, an occasion which gives them the chance to really enjoy themselves. However, they are shocked to learn their summer camp has been taken over by a fanatical fitness trainer determined to knock them into shape by fair means or foul. Family comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Aaron Schwartz, Shaun Weiss and Tom Hodges.

programme.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
programme.desc: A professor invents a ray with the power to reduce objects in size. Unfortunately, his kids and their meddling friends activate it and are shrunk to microscopic proportions. When they are accidentally thrown out with the rubbish, the children have to contend with all kinds of animals and insects on their journey home across the backyard. Disney comedy, with Rick Moranis, Marcia Strassman and Amy O'Neill.(n)

programme.title: I'll Be Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A college student finds himself stranded in the middle of the desert dressed in a Santa suit - the result of a prank by his classmates. He faces no end of unexpected obstacles as he makes a cross-country journey to be with his family for the festive season. Comedy, starring Jonathan Taylor Thomas, Jessica Biel, Adam LaVorgna and Gary Cole.(n)

programme.title: Meet the Robinsons
programme.desc: Orphaned child genius Lewis has an unexpected encounter with a boy who claims to be from the future. With some trepidation Lewis agrees to travel forward through time to meet his new friend's madcap family. However, a bowler-hatted villain threatens his chances of ever returning home. Animated adventure, with the voices of Angela Bassett, Daniel Hansen, Jordan Fry and Tom Selleck.(n)

programme.title: The Pacifier
programme.desc: A battle-hardened military veteran fails to protect a government scientist from assassins. He is assigned to safeguard the dead boffin's family in case the killers come after the top-secret technology in his home, but finds looking after kids proves far tougher than taking on hitmen. Family comedy, starring Vin Diesel and Lauren Graham.(n)

programme.title: The Incredibles
programme.desc: A superhero couple facing litigation from a disgruntled public have to swap fighting crime for dreary suburban normality. Bored and frustrated, the husband signs up for a mysterious assignment on a remote island - unaware he is jumping straight into a trap that will require his wife and children to wield all their powers to save him. Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: Return to Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy is whisked back to Oz in a storm and discovers the evil Nome King has taken over the magical land and turned her old friends to stone. Teaming up with some strange new companions, she sets out to banish him and his monstrous comrades. Fantasy adventure, based on the novels by L Frank Baum, starring Fairuza Balk, Jean Marsh, Nicol Williamson and Piper Laurie.(n)

programme.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks
programme.desc: A novice witch befriends three children and takes them on a series of magical journeys, including a visit to a land inhabited by cartoon animals, where they get involved in a decidedly one-sided football match against a spoilt lion king. Disney's part-animated musical fantasy, starring Angela Lansbury, David Tomlinson, Roddy McDowall and Sam Jaffe.(n)

programme.title: 101 Dalmatians
programme.desc: Wicked fashion designer Cruella De Vil steals a huge litter of newborn Dalmatian puppies to turn into a magnificent coat - but the lucky pups have many four-legged friends who are determined the evil woman and her cronies will get their just deserts. Disney's live-action remake of the animated comedy adventure, starring Glenn Close, Jeff Daniels, Joely Richardson, Hugh Laurie and Mark Williams.(n)

programme.title: Dumbo
programme.desc: Disney animated adventure following the fortunes of a plucky young elephant with oversized ears. Mocked by his fellow circus performers, Dumbo finally finds a friend in an enterprising mouse, who helps the poor animal overcome his inhibitions and find fame and fortune as the world's only flying elephant. With the voices of Sterling Holloway and Edward Brophy, and an Oscar-winning score by Frank Churchill and Oliver Wallace.(n)

programme.title: The Incredibles

Pixar's animated adventure, with the voices of Craig T Nelson, Holly Hunter, Jason Lee and Samuel L Jackson.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: At World's End
programme.desc: The swashbuckling rogues join forces with old foe Barbossa to take on villainous Lord Beckett. But first they have to journey to the ends of the Earth to free Captain Jack Sparrow from his hellish imprisonment in Davy Jones' Locker. Fantasy adventure sequel, starring Johnny Depp, Geoffrey Rush, Orlando Bloom, Keira Knightley and Chow Yun-Fat, and featuring a cameo appearance by Keith Richards.(n)

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Drama Queen
programme.desc: A New York teenager moves with her parents to a small town, where she quickly gets drawn into a bitter conflict with a local girl - until auditions for a musical give her the chance to outshine her rival. Meanwhile, she faces the challenge of working out how to get back to the big city for her favourite band's farewell concert. Drama, starring Lindsay Lohan, Adam Garcia, Glenne Headly and Alison Pill.(n)

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo
programme.desc: The hapless hound and his chums reunite after a bitter break-up to solve a baffling mystery in the ghost-themed tourist resort of Spooky Island, whose owner is convinced he has a genuine haunting on his hands. Live-action comedy adventure based on the cartoon series, starring Sarah Michelle Gellar, Matthew Lillard, Freddie Prinze Jr, Linda Cardellini and Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging
programme.desc: A 14-year-old girl struggles to cope with the torments of growing up, fitting in and finding a boyfriend. Tired of being a social outcast, she plans to throw the perfect birthday party to win the respect of her peers. Comedy drama based on Louise Rennison's series of novels, starring Georgia Groome, Alan Davies, Karen Taylor and Aaron Taylor-Johnson.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Blue-collar caveman Fred Flintstone is promoted to an executive position at work and unwittingly becomes embroiled in an embezzlement scheme - thanks in no small part to his seductive new assistant. Live-action version of the cartoon comedy, starring John Goodman, Rick Moranis, Rosie O'Donnell, Halle Berry and Elizabeth Taylor.

programme.title: Horton Hears a Who
programme.desc: A kindly elephant hears a cry of help coming from a speck of dust and discovers the minuscule city of Whoville. As he tries to help its citizens, the other animals begin to question his sanity, and the evil Kangaroo incites them to turn against the do-gooder. Animated adaptation of Dr Seuss's book, with the voices of Jim Carrey, Steve Carell, Carol Burnett, Seth Rogen and Will Arnett.

programme.title: Ice Age 3: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Sid the sloth discovers three eggs - but when they hatch into dinosaurs, he struggles to keep them under control. The creatures' mother comes looking for her offspring and takes them and Sid to an underground world where the giant reptiles never became extinct. Sid's friends, aided by a crazed one-eyed weasel, head for this strange new land to rescue him. Animated adventure sequel, with the voices of John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Ray Romano and Simon Pegg.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A theatre-owning koala sets up a singing competition in a last-ditch bid to stay afloat. Animation, with the voices of Matthew McConaughey, Reese Witherspoon, Seth MacFarlane and Scarlett Johansson.

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.

programme.title: The Golden Child
programme.desc: A private eye is recruited by a group of Buddhist mystics and sent on a mission to rescue an abducted boy whose supernatural powers will enable him to bring about world peace. However, the kidnapper is actually a demon in human form, determined to ensure the youngster does not fulfil his destiny. Comedy fantasy adventure, starring Eddie Murphy, Charles Dance and Charlotte Lewis.

programme.title: Aquamarine
programme.desc: A mermaid fleeing an arranged marriage becomes stranded at a beach resort. There she meets two local girls - lifelong friends about to be separated when one of them moves to Australia - and seeks their help in winning the heart of a lifeguard she has fallen for. In return, she promises to grant them their wish to stay together. Fantasy comedy, with Sara Paxton, Emma Roberts and Joanna Levesque.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzie Bear and company try to take Broadway by storm with their college show, setting the stage for a host of misadventures as they yearn for stardom in the Big Apple and set out to raise the money to finance their production. Comedy, performed by Jim Henson and Frank Oz, with appearances by Liza Minnelli, Art Carney, Dabney Coleman, Gregory Hines, Joan Rivers, Brooke Shields, Linda Lavin and Elliott Gould.

programme.title: The GadgetGang! In Outer Space
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes to Earth, revealing a group of quirky little space aliens on the run for their lives. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Brian Munn, Antony Salerno and David McDonald.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: A museum guide takes a trip to the jungle in search of a priceless ancient artefact. Instead, he returns home with a mischievous monkey, whose natural curiosity gets him into all kinds of trouble in the big city. Animated adventure based on the series of children's books, with the voices of Will Ferrell, Drew Barrymore, Frank Welker, Eugene Levy, Joan Plowright and Dick Van Dyke.

programme.title: Rock Dog
programme.desc: A wide-eyed hound leaves his village home to pursue his rock star dream in the big city. Animated family adventure, featuring the voices of Luke Wilson, Eddie Izzard and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: Youngster Fern tries to persuade her father to keep the runt of a litter when a sow gives birth to piglets on the family farm. While the little pig still looks destined for the chop, clever spider Charlotte hatches a plan to use her web-spinning talents to save him. Family drama, starring Dakota Fanning and featuring the voices of Julia Roberts, Dominic Scott Kay, Steve Buscemi and John Cleese.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Dismissed from the Anti-Villain League after botching a mission, Gru sets off to meet his long-lost twin brother. Animated sequel, with the voices of Steve Carell, Kristen Wiig and Trey Parker.

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: Homer unwittingly pollutes Lake Springfield, so the US government decides to isolate the city underneath a giant dome. The Simpsons manage to escape and plan to start a new life in Alaska - but learn Springfield is about to be destroyed, and return to save their friends. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright and Yeardley Smith.

programme.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events
programme.desc: Three orphans are entrusted into the care of their sinister uncle, a master of disguise who intends to kill them for the family fortune. Quickly realising he is up to no good, the children flee, moving from one prospective guardian to the next - but their wily relative is never far behind. Comedy adventure based on the children's books, starring Jim Carrey, Meryl Streep, Jude Law, Liam Aitken and Emily Browning, with Kara and Shelby Hoffman.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: A fun-loving male cow who spends his time hanging out with his friends and partying all night is forced to accept responsibility for the first time in his life, after being placed in charge of the farmyard following the untimely demise of his father. Animated comedy, with the voices of Kevin James, Courteney Cox, Sam Elliott, Danny Glover and Andie MacDowell.(n)

programme.title: Ozzy: The Great Furscape
programme.desc: Put to work by an evil kennel owner, Ozzy the beagle and his fellow canine inmates band together and launch a daring escape attempt. Animated adventure, featuring the voices of Jacob Tremblay, Will Sasso and Jeff Foxworthy.(n)
