Pazienza takes down French boxer Gilbert Delé to become Super Middleweight Champion. Shortly after the bout however, a head-on car crash leaves him with a broken neck. Initially told he may never walk again, Pazienza chooses a risky "halo" spine-stabilization treatment, requiring him to wear a circular metal brace screwed directly into his skull for six months.(n)

programme.title: I, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: Daniel Blake (Dave Johns) is a man out of time. He's a widowed woodworker who's never owned a computer and lives according to his own common sense moral code. After a heart attack leaves him unable to work and the state welfare system fails him, Daniel must stand up and fight for his dignity and lead a one-man crusade for compassion that transforms the lives of a single mother (Hayley Squires) and her two children.(n)

programme.title: Swing Away
programme.desc: Following a meltdown that leads to a suspension, professional golfer Zoe Papadopoulos travels to her grandparents' village in Greece to escape the harsh spotlight of the international sports world. Between baking bread and eating baklava, she meets and mentors a ten-year-old girl who is determined to become the next golf sensation. Along the way, Zoe rediscovers her Greek heritage, her love of the game and the hidden strength within herself.(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Action film series starring Danny Glover and Danny Trejo as senior heroes who visit Louisiana for a wedding escape only to encounter violence and mayhem, and once again, must pursue their own form of justice.(n)

programme.title: Pork Pie
programme.desc: A trio of accidental outlaws travel the length of New Zealand in a yellow Mini, protesting conformity and chasing lost love, with a posse of cops and a media frenzy hot in their pursuit.(n)

programme.title: Fanboys
programme.desc: When they discover that a friend is going to die before the release of the long-awaited next chapter in a massively successful sci-fi movie franchise, a group of diehard sci-fi geeks travels cross country to steal a print from a legendary filmmaker, encountering everything along the way from rabidly rival fans of a competing epic series, to Las Vegas strippers. Jay Baruchel, Dan Fogler, Sam Huntington and Christopher Marquette star in this hilarious road trip comedy.(n)

programme.title: Episode #311
programme.desc: Brian is fired when he's caught undermining Stockwell's campaign; Ben and Michael tell Hunter he's positive; Ted's tempted to go to his first White Party with his new "friends.".(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Episode #312
programme.desc: Brian investigates the death of Dumpster Boy based on a tip from Hunter; Emmett is furious when Melanie and Lindsay insist Ted's an addict; Ted asks Emmett to share his experience.(n)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Episode #313
programme.desc: Hunter collects evidence tying Dumpster Boy's murderer to Stockwell; Justin risks expulsion when he refuses to apologize for his anti-Stockwell posters; Emmett confronts Ted about his drug use.(n)

credits.writer: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: In the future, the Navy has developed a fighter jet piloted by artificial intelligence. The jet is placed on an aircraft carrier in the Pacific, under the command of stern Capt. George Cummings (Sam Shepard). The Navy has also chosen three pilots for a new generation of stealth fighter-bombers, designed to instantly respond to sightings of terrorists anywhere in the world. When the computer develops a mind of its own, it's the humans who must stop it before it precipitates a nuclear war. Also starring Jessica Biel, Josh Lucas and Jamie Foxx.(n)

programme.title: Hostel
programme.desc: A pair of horny American college students on a backpacking trip across Europe stumble into a hellish nightmare of murder for profit in this horror smash from director Eli Roth ("Cabin Fever"), starring Jay Hernandez and Derek Richardson, with Eythor Gudjonsson, Barbara Nedeljakova, Jan Vlasak, Jana Kaderabkova and Jennifer Lim.(n)

programme.title: Hostel: Part II
programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo.(n)

programme.title: Kevin Smith: Silent But Deadly
programme.desc: Kevin Smith, the filmmaker, is anything but quiet in this new comedy special that was recorded an hour before his widely reported massive heart attack in February. But before he nearly died backstage, he killed onstage discussing his marriage, his kid, his friends and his work (or lack thereof).(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: Samuel Beckett: Waiting for Andre
programme.desc: The story of driver Samuel Beckett's school runs with 12-year-old Andre Roussimoff, who is too big for the school bus and later becomes legendary wrestler Andre the Giant. Over the course of a year their friendship evolves.(n)

programme.title: Blue Chips
programme.desc: Championship-winning coach Pete Bell (Nick Nolte) runs the cleanest program in collegiate basketball. When he finds himself on the brink of his first losing season, Bell decides he must make a risky move to protect his job: under-the-table dollars for talent. Betraying his conscience and the trust of his ex-wife (Mary McDonnell), bell signs the nation's blue chips: a farm boy forward (Matt Nover), a playmaking guard from the projects (Penny Hardaway), and Neon Bodeaux (Shaquille O'Neal), a 7-foot slam-dunking phenom from the bayou.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.(n)

programme.title: May 2018
programme.desc: Unflinching, unpredictable and utterly unfiltered, former UFC fighter, comedian and award-winning podcaster, Brendan Schaub explores the latest news in combat sports and pop culture in a first-of-its-kind sports talk show. Featuring interviews with the biggest names in combat sports and entertainment, road trips, fight camp visits, animation and pop culture spoofs.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as Jim Terrier, an ex-special forces government contractor who is betrayed by the organization he once worked for and must go on the run in a relentless game of cat and mouse across Africa and Europe.(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: Ben Affleck takes over the role of hero CIA agent Jack Ryan in this box office hit based on the best-selling novel by Tom Clancy. Low-level analyst Ryan is elevated to prominence by his expertise on an obscure strongman (Ciaran Hinds) after the politician's surprising ascendancy to the Russian presidency. But that's just the tip of a very large, very lethal iceberg involving neo-Nazis and a nuclear warhead smuggled into the U.S. by terrorists. Morgan Freeman, Bridget Moynihan and Liev Schreiber costar in this espionage adventure.(n)

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: Once a year, fourteen-year-old David (Josh Wiggins) travels from his mother's home in Texas to visit his loner father, Cal (Matt Bomer), in the remote mountains of Montana. There, the two embark on their annual hunting excursion, during which the taciturn Cal attempts to connect with his smartphone-addicted son. But when a terrifying turn of events leaves Cal critically wounded, it's up to the teenage David to summon enough strength for both of them.(n)

programme.title: Texas Rangers
programme.desc: A ragtag group of youngsters band together after the American Civil War to form the Texas Rangers, a group charged with the duty of cleaning up the West.(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as Jim Terrier, an ex-special forces government contractor who is betrayed by the organization he once worked for and must go on the run in a relentless game of cat and mouse across Africa and Europe.(n)

programme.title: 68 Kill
programme.desc: Trailer-dwelling, sewage-pumping Chip (Matthew Gray Gubler) has got one thing going for him: he's head over heels infatuated with his girlfriend Liza (AnnaLynne McCord). He's more than willing to overlook her wild streak—the fact that she's hooking up with their landlord; her rather extreme mood swings —so when she proposes a plot to steal $68,000, he goes along with the plan. But when what was supposed to be a simple heist turns into an off-the-rails, blood-spattered crime spree.(n)

programme.title: Martin Lawrence Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedy legend Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama, to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at LA's Orpheum Theatre.(n)

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: In the 1860's, Hugh Crain finances the construction of Hill House, then dies an unexplained death. Tales circulate that the mansion is haunted by evil spirits. 130 years later, Dr. David Marrow (Liam Neeson), long fascinated by the Hill House legend, brings three people there for what he tells them will be a study in sleep disorders. They're outwardly brave, but it soon becomes evident that Hill House's sinister reputation has all of them on edge. Catherine Zeta-Jones, Lili Taylor and Owen Wilson costar.(n)

programme.title: Kirk Fox: That Guy
programme.desc: In this stand-up comedy special, Kirk Fox examines that guy we all wonder about who sits at the bar by himself. He covers what makes that guy tick, his frequent social faux pas and his misunderstandings with women.(n)

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay. He owes his soul to the ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death - and eternal damnation - by seizing the fabled Dead Man's Chest. Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley star.(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: This sci-fi epic envisions a future world that has fallen into anarchy on the heels of an infertility defect in the population that has made humankind face the likelihood of its own extinction. Set against a backdrop of London torn apart by violence, the film follows one of the champions of Earth's survival: Theo (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen), a disillusioned ex-activist turned bureaucrat, who faces his own demons and must protect the planet's last remaining hope for a future generation.(n)

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Isolated and cut off from the city inside a soon-to-be-closed L.A. police station, a group of police officers and convicts join forces to defend themselves against a gang who wants to kill someone trapped inside the precinct.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
programme.desc: A woman emerges from a coma four years after taking a bullet to the head at her own wedding, and goes on an epic vendetta against her former boss and his deadly squad of international assassins in a kill or be-killed fight. Directed by Quentin Tarantino; stars Uma Thurman and Lucy Liu.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Captain Jack Sparrow has a blood debt to pay. He owes his soul to the ghastly Davy Jones unless he can cheat death - and eternal damnation - by seizing the fabled Dead Man's Chest. Johnny Depp, Orlando Bloom and Keira Knightley star.(n)

programme.title: Misaki vs. Riggs (R)
programme.desc: The world's top MMA (mixed martial arts) fighters engage in awe-inspiring hand-to-hand combat in this series of events that pits world-class athletes together in stylistic combinations that make every fight intense, exciting and unpredictable.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Ghost in the Shell
programme.desc: In the near future, Major (Scarlett Johansson) is the first of her kind - a human saved from a terrible crash, who is cyber-enhanced to be a perfect soldier devoted to stopping the world's most dangerous criminals. Terrorism has reached a new level that includes the ability to hack into people's minds and control them, but Major is uniquely qualified to stop it. As she prepares to face a new enemy, Major discovers that she has been lied to: her life was not saved, it was stolen. Now she must figure out who created her.(n)

programme.title: Bad Santa
programme.desc: Criminals Willie (Tony Cox) and Marcus (Billy Bob Thornton) disguise themselves as Santa Claus and his elf and travel across the country to major malls, using the good will people have toward Santa to rob the stores blind. However, Willie can't stand kids and it's all he can do to keep himself from getting fired while on the job. Their plan progresses beautifully until the two meet an introverted 8-year-old boy who thinks Willie is the real Santa Claus, and strikes real sympathy in him.(n)

programme.title: Christine
programme.desc: High school geek Arnie Cunningham falls in love with Christine, a bright red 1957 Plymouth Fury which has seen much better days. After restoring the car to its original condition, his friends notice that the car is not the only thing that is changing. Arnie seems to spend more and more time with his car. He's also developed a cocky arrogance which does not seem like the real Arnie at all.(n)

programme.title: Stealth
programme.desc: In the future, the Navy has developed a fighter jet piloted by artificial intelligence. The jet is placed on an aircraft carrier in the Pacific, under the command of stern Capt. George Cummings (Sam Shepard). The Navy has also chosen three pilots for a new generation of stealth fighter-bombers, designed to instantly respond to sightings of terrorists anywhere in the world. When the computer develops a mind of its own, it's the humans who must stop it before it precipitates a nuclear war. Also starring Jessica Biel, Josh Lucas and Jamie Foxx.(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: Bleed For This
programme.desc: Boxer Vinny Pazienza (Miles Teller) moves up two weight classes under the guidance of his new trainer Kevin Rooney (Aaron Eckhart). Pazienza takes down French boxer Gilbert Delé to become Super Middleweight Champion. Shortly after the bout however, a head-on car crash leaves him with a broken neck. Initially told he may never walk again, Pazienza chooses a risky "halo" spine-stabilization treatment, requiring him to wear a circular metal brace screwed directly into his skull for six months.(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Robert De Niro directs this story of a young CIA agent during the Cold War whose dedication to work costs him his innocence and his soul. Academy Award winners Matt Damon and Angelina Jolie also star.(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.(n)

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon.(n)

programme.title: Superhero Movie
programme.desc: This rib-tickling spoof of comic book adventures stars Drake Bell as a teenager who is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly and attains super powers. Leslie Nielsen and Tracy Morgan costar in this hilarious send-up.(n)

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.

programme.title: Running Wild
programme.desc: A retired Air Force Major (Gregory Harrison), now a UN observer for the International Wildlife Organization, and his children confront elephant poachers in Zimbabwe. Simon MacCorkindale, Cody Jones and Brooke Nevin costar.

programme.title: Mrs McCutcheon
programme.desc: Having always felt he was born in the wrong body, 10-year-old Tom chooses the name Mrs McCutcheon rather than the name he was given at birth; he also prefers the flow of a dress rather than the cut of a pant. Now at his third school, Tom is having trouble settling in and finding acceptance from his newfound peers - except for Trevor, a tough little charmer who also suffers prejudice due to his Aboriginal heritage.

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder.

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs.

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.

programme.title: Running Wild
programme.desc: A retired Air Force Major (Gregory Harrison), now a UN observer for the International Wildlife Organization, and his children confront elephant poachers in Zimbabwe. Simon MacCorkindale, Cody Jones and Brooke Nevin costar.

programme.title: New Wave: Dare to be Different
programme.desc: In August, 1982, a small group of radio visionaries at WLIR Long Island knew they couldn't compete with the mega radio stations in New York City. With one brave decision, they changed the sound of radio forever. Program Director Denis McNamara, the crew at the station and the biggest artists of the era tell the story of how they battled the FCC, the record labels, mega-radio and all the conventional rules to create a musical movement that brought the New Wave to America - including bands like U2, Talking Heads, Depeche Mode and Blondie.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953, a time when women's roles are rigidly defined, novice art history professor Katherine Watson begins teaching at the prestigious all-female Wellesley College, which despite its academic reputation, is an environment where success is measured by how well the students marry. Encouraging these women to strive for a more enlightened future, Watson challenges the administration and inspires her students to look beyond the image of what is, and consider the possibilities of what could be.

programme.title: Before I Fall
programme.desc: Sam (Zoey Deutch) seems to have everything a teenage girl could want: popularity, a hot boyfriend, cool status, fun friends, loving family and seeming happiness. But beyond the superficial, Sam's life isn't so charmed. She is one of a clique of high school mean girls who make life hell for those who are different. When Sam is killed in a car accident, she is forced to relive her last day on Earth seven times in order to get things right. She attempts to make sense of what befell her and gain a better understanding of herself and others.

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: A mathematical genius, John Forbes Nash Jr, makes an astonishing discovery early in his career and stands on the brink of international acclaim. But he soon finds himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery. Russell Crowe stars.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953, a time when women's roles are rigidly defined, novice art history professor Katherine Watson begins teaching at the prestigious all-female Wellesley College, which despite its academic reputation, is an environment where success is measured by how well the students marry. Encouraging these women to strive for a more enlightened future, Watson challenges the administration and inspires her students to look beyond the image of what is, and consider the possibilities of what could be.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Mrs McCutcheon
programme.desc: Having always felt he was born in the wrong body, 10-year-old Tom chooses the name Mrs McCutcheon rather than the name he was given at birth; he also prefers the flow of a dress rather than the cut of a pant. Now at his third school, Tom is having trouble settling in and finding acceptance from his newfound peers - except for Trevor, a tough little charmer who also suffers prejudice due to his Aboriginal heritage.

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with.

programme.title: Cody the Robosapien
programme.desc: When a 12-year-old boy discovers a broken robot, he finds a zany and powerful new best friend who can change his life for the better but when the evil corporation that funded the robot's creation intervenes, the pair must team up to save their family.

programme.title: Gambler's Ballad: The Legend of Johnny Thompson
programme.desc: This film explores one of the greatest magicians and magic minds in history, Johnny Thompson. He teaches fellow magician Penn Jillette his signature piece called Gambler's Ballad.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful (La vita e bella)
programme.desc: Guido is a charming, bumbling Jewish waiter whose colorful imagination and playful spirit help him to woo a beautiful schoolteacher. The couple marries and has a young son, but before long, their idyllic world is threatened by Nazi soldiers who force the family into a concentration camp. Guido must now use his imagination again - this time to transform his son's tragic new surroundings into a magical wonderland.

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Sci-fi action highlights this breezy fantasy starring Jesse Bradford as Zak Gibbs, a high school student who "borrows" the latest invention of his scientist dad, a "hyper-time" device that impresses a pretty exchange student (Paula Garces) but also attracts the attention of a sinister government agent (Michael Biehn). French Stewart and Julia Sweeney costar in this teen adventure in the tradition of "Back to the Future.".(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.(n)

programme.title: Surviving The Wild
programme.desc: Following the untimely death of his grandpa Gus (Jon Voight), thirteen-year-old Shaun (Aidan Cullen) disregards his parent's wishes and embarks on a journey with his dog Riley, to spread his grandpa's ashes in the wild. Throughout the journey, Shaun is guided by the spirit of his grandfather. Together they overcome challenge after challenge, as Shaun traverses white water rapids and tries to evade two crazed hillbillies that are on his tail.(n)

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful (La vita e bella)
programme.desc: Guido is a charming, bumbling Jewish waiter whose colorful imagination and playful spirit help him to woo a beautiful schoolteacher. The couple marries and has a young son, but before long, their idyllic world is threatened by Nazi soldiers who force the family into a concentration camp. Guido must now use his imagination again - this time to transform his son's tragic new surroundings into a magical wonderland.(n)

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong.(n)

programme.title: Swing Away
programme.desc: Following a meltdown that leads to a suspension, professional golfer Zoe Papadopoulos travels to her grandparents' village in Greece to escape the harsh spotlight of the international sports world. Between baking bread and eating baklava, she meets and mentors a ten-year-old girl who is determined to become the next golf sensation. Along the way, Zoe rediscovers her Greek heritage, her love of the game and the hidden strength within herself.(n)

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.(n)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship.(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.(n)

programme.title: Daisy
programme.desc: A thirteen-year-old girl named Daisy (Hattie Gotobed), who suffers from terminal Epidermolysis Bullosa, meets Stinky (Max Brown), a British war veteran and drug addict. Like Peter Pan, Stinky is stuck in Neverland and like Wendy, Daisy inspires him to change his ways - helping him learn to appreciate life, find hope and find the kind of love that she knows she will never get to experience.(n)

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer.(n)

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.(n)

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.(n)

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.(n)

programme.title: Single White Female
programme.desc: Hedy (Jennifer Jason Leigh) appears at the apartment of Allie (Bridget Fonda) just as she has thrown out her unfaithful boyfriend (Steven Weber). The surviving half of a set of twins, Hedy perpetually seeks someone to complete her, and sees in Allie everything she would like to be. Hedy moves not only into the apartment, but into the most personal aspects of Allie's life, including having her hair styled exactly to match her roommate's. When Allie reconciles with her boyfriend, the unspoken bargain between the women goes terrifyingly awry.

programme.title: Single White Female 2: The Psycho
programme.desc: When Holly Parker (Kristen Miller) moves into her new apartment, she thinks she has found the perfect roommate: Tess Kositch (Allison Lange), a sweet and shy young woman who wants to be her friend. But underneath Tess' shy exterior lies a killer who believes there is nothing sweeter in life than murdering a friend in pain. And Holly is feeling a lot of pain lately, what with her boyfriend cheating on her and her co-worker undermining any chance she has for promotion. But Holly need not worry, Tess will take care of her.

programme.title: Life During Wartime
programme.desc: One sister is a bitter screenwriter, another meets an older man she hopes will give structure to her disordered life, and a third must deal with a child-molesting ex-husband who has been paroled from jail and wants to reconcile with their son. Allison Janney, Ally Sheedy and Shirley Henderson star in this dysfunctional family drama from director Todd Solondz, a sequel to his earlier film "Happiness" that casts new actors in the same roles.

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon.

programme.title: An Eye For Beauty
programme.desc: Luc is a brilliant young architect with a budding reputation. Opinionated, charming and confident, he lives with his beautiful wife in the stunning countryside of Quebec. Luc's seemingly perfect life begins to fall apart, however, when he meets and falls for a mysterious woman during a business trip. Caught in a triangle of emotions, he puts everything in jeopardy to pursue his affair, including the life he has built and the woman he loves.

programme.title: Mistrust
programme.desc: Happy, beautiful and independent, Veronica enjoys being a mistress. No commitment, no strings and she never has to be vulnerable. She has carefully laid every brick in the walls of the fortress surrounding her heart. She's safe and having a great time. However, there is one person who knew her heart before those walls were erected, her best friend Brandon, who has stood by her for too many years to count. And while Veronica has tried to keep her feelings at bay, he is the one who holds the key that opens her Pandora's box of emotions.

programme.title: Devil's Pass
programme.desc: Nine Russian hikers venture into a remote area of the Ural Mountains. Two weeks later, all nine are found dead. Five ambitious American college students are issued a grant to return to the site of the original events in the belief that they can uncover and document the truth of what happened. Their trek through the mountains, retracing the steps of that ill-fated journey, is plagued by strange and increasingly terrifying phenomena, all of which suggest that they are not alone. The forces behind the Dyatlov Pass Incident are waiting for them.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: Michael and Joanna Reed (Sam Worthington and Keira Knightley) seem to have it all. Young, attractive and successful, they're a married couple who've lucked into spiritual and material well-being, sharing a comfortable life in their trendy Manhattan apartment. But when they attend one of Michael's work parties, Joanna witnesses a suspicious moment between her husband and his beautiful new co-worker, Laura (Eva Mendes). Joanna can't be sure what she did or didn't see - but it sows a powerful seed of doubt.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Just when Bridget thinks life is perfect, her relationship with the dreamy Mark Darcy implodes. She sets off on a whirlwind business trip to Thailand where she encounters old flame Daniel Cleaver, and her life gets out-of-control.

programme.title: Sidewalks of New York
programme.desc: After sharing the stories of their earliest sexual experiences with an interviewer, six people are trailed by a cameraman through the course of an average day. Tommy (Edward Burns) is a successful television producer (and unsuccessful novelist) who becomes quickly infatuated when he meets Maria (Rosario Dawson) in a video store. Maria is a teacher who has just gotten out of a bad marriage with Ben (David Krumholtz), a struggling musician with a day job as a doorman. Ben, on the other hand, finds himself attracted to Ashley (Brittany Murphy).

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Gilby Smalls (Fran Kranz) is having a meltdown. He's just been fired from his job and his girlfriend gave him the boot. Forced to move in with May (Coleen Camp), his booze-swilling man-obsessed mother, he's desperate to turn things around. Gilby's luck seems to change when he meets Rachel (Odette Annable), the very thing Gilby needs to get his life back on track. Desperate to impress her, Gilby starts to weave a web of lies; one bigger than the next. Now in a sticky mess, Gilby is forced to face the uncomfortable truth about himself.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.

programme.title: Last Night
programme.desc: Michael and Joanna Reed (Sam Worthington and Keira Knightley) seem to have it all. Young, attractive and successful, they're a married couple who've lucked into spiritual and material well-being, sharing a comfortable life in their trendy Manhattan apartment. But when they attend one of Michael's work parties, Joanna witnesses a suspicious moment between her husband and his beautiful new co-worker, Laura (Eva Mendes). Joanna can't be sure what she did or didn't see - but it sows a powerful seed of doubt.

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: Pop music sensation Britney Spears stars in this teen road-trip drama about a trio of high school pals that heads for the bright lights of Los Angeles, meeting up with both romance and loss along the way. Zoe Saldana, Taryn Manning, Anson Mount, Dan Aykroyd and Kim Cattrall costar in this film from director Tamra Davis ("Billy Madison").

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Just when Bridget thinks life is perfect, her relationship with the dreamy Mark Darcy implodes. She sets off on a whirlwind business trip to Thailand where she encounters old flame Daniel Cleaver, and her life gets out-of-control.

programme.title: The Whistleblower
programme.desc: Kathy (Academy Award® winner Rachel Weisz) is an American police officer who takes a job working as a peacekeeper in post-war Bosnia. Her expectations of helping to rebuild a devastated country are dashed when she uncovers a dangerous reality of corruption, cover-up and intrigue, amid a world of private contractors and multinational diplomatic doubletalk. Directed by Larysa Kondracki, the film also stars Academy Award® winner Vanessa Redgrave, Monica Bellucci and Academy Award® nominee David Strathairn.

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.

programme.title: Blood and Chocolate
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf living in Bucharest falls in love with a visiting American artist and threatens the future of her entire species by pursuing the romance. Agnes Brucker, Hugh Dancy and Olivier Martinez star in this ominous, supernatural love story based on the novel by Annette Curtis Klause.

programme.title: Against the Current
programme.desc: Justin Kirk and Joseph Fiennes star in this independent drama about a middle-aged man who decides to fulfill a childhood dream of swimming 150 miles of the Hudson River with his best friend rowing alongside for encouragement, but a bittersweet hidden agenda for the feat is gradually revealed. Mary Tyler Moore costars.

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Haunted by the kidnapping and murder of his ten-year-old son, a grieving detective (Jon Hamm) seeks redemption when he investigates a fifty-year-old murder case with eerie similarities to his story. Josh Lucas and James Van Der Beek costar in this mystery thriller.

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world.

programme.title: Shot
programme.desc: Three lives are irrevocably changed when a gun is accidentally fired on a busy LA street. Mark (Noah Wyle) and Phoebe (Sharon Leal) are in the midst of a breakup. Miguel (Jorge Lendeborg, Jr.), a bullied teenager, is given an illegal gun by his cousin for protection. As Miguel handles it, the gun accidently fires and Mark is hit by the bullet.

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: A mathematical genius, John Forbes Nash Jr, makes an astonishing discovery early in his career and stands on the brink of international acclaim. But he soon finds himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery. Russell Crowe stars.

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").(n)

programme.title: Alone in Berlin
programme.desc: Otto and Anna Quangel (Brendan Gleeson & Emma Thompson) are a working-class husband and wife doing their best to ride out the war in Berlin in 1940. When their son is killed fighting on the frontlines however, everything changes. They begin pouring their rage and grief into postcards emblazoned with anti-Nazi slogans, risking everything to get their messages of protest across the city. This seemingly small act of subversion rattles the regime, including a police inspector (Daniel Brühl) who will not rest until the culprits have been caught.(n)

programme.title: The Illusionist
programme.desc: Set in early 20th-century Vienna, a stage magician uses his magic to win back the great love of his life from a brutal enemy, her fiancé, who is also the powerful crowned prince of Austria. Stars Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti and Jessica Biel.(n)

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: A mathematical genius, John Forbes Nash Jr, makes an astonishing discovery early in his career and stands on the brink of international acclaim. But he soon finds himself on a harrowing journey of self-discovery. Russell Crowe stars.(n)

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.(n)

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.(n)

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.(n)

programme.title: Two Weeks
programme.desc: A quartet of siblings gather at the North Carolina home of their dying mother, where squabbling, bickering, and ultimately, emotional healing and grace, are in the offing. Sally Field and Ben Chaplin lead the cast of this ensemble comedy-drama, costarring Julianne Nicholson and Tom Cavanagh.(n)

programme.title: Prophet's Prey
programme.desc: Documentary revealing the shocking life of notorious cult leader Warren Jeffs, and the FLDS Church, who through brainwashing and abuse seized control of his followers' lives and an organization worth hundreds of millions of dollars. While Jeffs is currently serving a life sentence for his crimes, he still exerts total authority over his flock. Features unprecedented interviews with Church insiders and victims, exposing the nightmarish hell of unspeakable crimes that still continue to this day.(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: Casey, a young American backpacker in Germany, falls in love with Juliette, a fellow American traveling through Europe. She is diagnosed with a fatal disease, and Casey decides to steal from German gangster Hagen, in order to pay for the medical treatment which could save Juliette's life. Casey's heist doesn't go as planned and Hagen catches him. He manages to escape Hagen's men, steal one of Hagen's cars, and flee. Pursued across Germany, he races to save his own life and get to Juliette before Hagen's men get to her first.(n)

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile
programme.desc: In 1953, a time when women's roles are rigidly defined, novice art history professor Katherine Watson begins teaching at the prestigious all-female Wellesley College, which despite its academic reputation, is an environment where success is measured by how well the students marry. Encouraging these women to strive for a more enlightened future, Watson challenges the administration and inspires her students to look beyond the image of what is, and consider the possibilities of what could be.(n)

programme.title: The Fantasticks
programme.desc: Joel Grey and Brad Sullivan are small-town fathers conspiring to bring their children together in a love match by pretending to discourage it in this magical musical costarring Barnard Hughes.(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(n)

programme.title: The Courtship of Eddie's Father
programme.desc: A young son thinks it's about time for his widowed father to start dating again, but he's not happy about dad's choices in women. So the lad takes matters into his own hands and tries to fix up his father with the attractive next-door neighbor. The film spawned a popular TV series (1969-72).

programme.title: Life With Father
programme.desc: An 1880s New York financier runs a tight ship, but his wife is really the captain, especially when she realizes that he is not baptized.

programme.title: An Eastern Westerner
programme.desc: The father of a spoiled young New Yorker ships him out West to a ranch, where he hopes the lad will toughen up and learn a bit of responsibility. Once there, he squares off against a town bully and falls for a local belle.

programme.title: High and Dizzy
programme.desc: In this silent comedy, Harold Lloyd stars as a novice doctor lacking patients, but finding one, and a love interest, in a young woman with a sleepwalking problem that lands both her and an inebriated Lloyd, on a ledge high atop a building. The object of his affection is played by Lloyd's future wife, Mildred Davis. Lloyd's real-life brother, Gaylord Lloyd, costars.

programme.title: Number, Please
programme.desc: A forger develops a yen for telephone switchboard girl Mabel Poulton.

programme.title: Get Out and Get Under
programme.desc: A young actor oversleeps and runs into a string of disasters while racing to get to the theater on time.

programme.title: Tokyo Drifter
programme.desc: Stylish tale about a hit man on the outs with his gang, whose former boss has hired assassins to wipe him out. Watari Tetsuya, Matsubara Chieko, Nitani Hideaki. Directed by Seijun Suzuki.

programme.title: Fighting Elegy
programme.desc: Director Seijun Suzuki's stark look at the consequences of idealism, focusing on the coming of age of a teen who turns to fascism to forget his unrequited love for a girl. Hideki Takahashi, Mitsuo Kataoka, Junko Asano, Yusuke Kawazu.

programme.title: Rock Rock Rock!
programme.desc: Desperate to go to a rock and roll dance, a teenage girl tries everything she can to raise money for a new dress to wear.

programme.title: The Cool Ones
programme.desc: A pop star trying to revive his sagging career and an up-and-coming singer are thrown together in a publicity stunt by their manager and wind up falling in love.

programme.title: Muscle Beach Party
programme.desc: Surfers feel threatened when a bunch of well-oiled weightlifters invade their turf on the beach.

programme.title: Attack of the 50 Ft. Woman
programme.desc: A neurotic woman claims to have had a close encounter with a UFO, only to be laughed off as a drunken fool. But then radiation from the spaceship begins to have a strange impact on her and big problems befall her philandering husband and the skeptical townspeople.

programme.title: The Wasp Woman
programme.desc: A rejuvenating beauty treatment made from insect enzymes has unexpected side effects for an aging and vain cosmetics executive, who demanded to be the test subject for the new product.

programme.title: Wild, Wild Planet
programme.desc: Thriller about the rulers of two planetary systems who fight for control of the universe. Tony Russell, Lisa Gastoni. Nurmi: Massimo Serato. Jake: Franco Nero. Ken: Carlo Giustini.

programme.title: From Hell It Came
programme.desc: Wooden acting marks this lumbering tale about a monster tree stump whose bite is worse than its bark. Tod Andrews, Tina Carver, Gregg Palmer. Mrs. Kilgore: Linda Watkins. Directed by Dan Milner.

programme.title: Teenagers on Trial
programme.desc: This 1955 short examines juvenile delinquency, positing reasons for the problem and offering possible solutions. Narrated by Bob Hite.

programme.title: Untamed Youth
programme.desc: Rock n' roll "women in prison" drama about two hitchhiking sisters who are sentenced to forced labor on a crooked cotton farm in the Deep South.

programme.title: Devotion
programme.desc: While his wife is away, a barrister (Leslie Howard) falls in love with his son's governess (Ann Harding). Harrington: Robert Williams. Mortimer: O.P. Heggie. Mrs. Mortimer: Louise Closser Hale. Coggins: Dudley Digges. Mrs. Coggins: Alison Skipworth. Margaret: Ruth Weston. Directed by Robert Milton.

programme.title: Berkeley Square
programme.desc: An English scientist travels to the 18th century pretending to be one of his ancestors and strikes up a romance with a distant cousin, but eventually returns to the present day, where he realizes his relationship has had an unexpected impact on history. Leslie Howard was nominated for Best Actor as the time-traveler.

programme.title: Secrets
programme.desc: Mary Pickford and Leslie Howard team in this story of a rancher whose past philandering could cost him a political nomination. C. Aubrey Smith. Mrs. Marlowe: Blanche Frederici. Susan: Doris Lloyd. Lord Hurley: Herbert Evans. Sunshine: Ned Sparks. Jake: Allan Sears. Senora Martinez: Mona Maris. Frank Borzage directed.

programme.title: The Animal Kingdom
programme.desc: Adaptation of Philip Barry's Broadway comedy of manners.

programme.title: It's Love I'm After
programme.desc: A theater couple's offstage romance is hampered by fits of temper and egotism.

programme.title: Smilin' Through
programme.desc: The old stage classic about a love that endured through the years.

programme.title: Leslie Howard
programme.desc: A short profiling British actor Leslie Howard.

programme.title: Lili
programme.desc: A fetching 16-year-old French orphan (Best Actress nominee Leslie Caron) joins a carnival after her father's death and finds a home with a curious puppet show, where the embittered puppeteer shows contempt for her but secretly falls for the young lady. Bronislau Kaper's score, which includes the lilting "Hi-Lili-Hi-Lo," won an Academy Award.

programme.title: Kismet
programme.desc: A wily street poet enters into a scheme to find a bride for the son of the ruler of Baghdad, and as fate would have it, his daughter is in love with the young man, and her father will need to call on all his "magical" powers to bring the two together.

programme.title: Royal Wedding
programme.desc: A sibling dance team is booked to play London at the time of Queen Elizabeth II's marriage. The musical is famous for a pair of Fred Astaire solos, one a duet with a coat rack, the other a tap dance across a ceiling.

programme.title: Silk Stockings
programme.desc: Musical remake of the 1939 comedy "Ninotchka" features a tuneful Cole Porter soundtrack and tells the tale of a stern Russian emissary sent to Paris on business but discovering the pleasures of capitalism and romance with a movie producer.

programme.title: The Band Wagon
programme.desc: A famous dancer whose career is on the decline stages a comeback with a musical adaptation of Faust, but fears the flamboyant director and his classical ballerina co-star will upstage him.

programme.title: It's Always Fair Weather
programme.desc: World War II service buddies reunite in a New York City bar 10 years after their discharge only to find they haven't that much in common anymore, until one of them gets in over his head with mobsters and the other two try to help him out of the jam. Directed by Stanley Donen and Gene Kelly, who stars as one of the three GIs.

programme.title: Brigadoon
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Broadway hit about a pair of American tourists on a hunting trip in Scotland who get lost and discover a mythical Scottish village. Based on the musical by Alan Jay Lerner. (cc).

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: During the transition to talkies, a 1920s silent-film star, who long ago paid his dues as a stunt man and bit player, falls in love with a spunky chorus girl, much to the dismay of his screechy-voiced prima-donna leading lady, in this lighthearted musical spoof of the early days of Hollywood. (cc).(n)

programme.title: An American in Paris
programme.desc: A former GI who remained in the City of Light to study painting is discovered by a wealthy benefactor, but he betrays her by romancing a woman who, unbeknownst to him, is already in a relationship with his best friend. A Best Picture winner. Gene Kelly stars and served as the film's choreographer. (cc).(n)

programme.title: Gigi
programme.desc: Picturesque adaptation of Colette's novel about a teenager (Daniele Delorme) groomed by her aunt to become a playboy's mistress. Yvonne De Bray. Alicia: Gaby Morlay. Gaston: Frank Villard. Honore: Jean Tissier. Directed by Jacqueline Audry.(n)

programme.title: Annie Get Your Gun
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Irving Berlin Broadway hit musical about legendary Wild West sharpshooter Annie Oakley, who rose from backwoods gamin to the uppermost rungs of international stardom. An Oscar winner for Best Musical Score.(n)

programme.title: Show Boat
programme.desc: Third version of the Jerome Kern-Oscar Hammerstein II musical about Mississippi riverboat life chronicles the problematic romance between the beautiful daughter of the ship's captain and a prodigious gambler.(n)

programme.title: Cruise of the Zaca

programme.desc: Joe Coughlin, the son of a Boston police lieutenant, moves to Florida during the Prohibition era to become a bootlegger. As his operation grows, Coughlin faces off against local gangsters, Klansmen and religious evangelicals while he fights for control of Tampa's criminal underworld. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Napoleon Dynamite
programme.desc: A rural high-school misfit, who lives with an equally odd family, helps his oddball friend run for class president. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A spaceship crashes on a remote planet and the survival of the stranded passengers may depend on a convict, whose special gift comes in handy when night falls. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: The Bone Collector
programme.desc: A brilliant quadriplegic detective forensics expert tracks a serial killer using computer technology, enlisting help from a gifted, but inexperienced rookie. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Sorority Boys
programme.desc: A trio of fraternity brothers are exiled from their house due to allegations of embezzlement. Hoping to remain on-campus without paying for room and board, the three brothers go undercover as sorority pledges. While posing as women, they try to find the real culprits behind the thefts. (repeat).(n)

programme.title: The Box
programme.desc: Arthur and Norma Lewis (James Marsden and Cameron Diaz) receive a mysterious box that will grant them $1 million if they push the button inside, but they must debate if that's worth the consequence of killing a random person. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Under the Tuscan Sun
programme.desc: A bitter, divorced writer finds solace and romance after she impulsively buys and renovates a villa in Tuscany. Screenplay adapted from the memoir by Frances Mayes. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: My Cousin Rachel
programme.desc: In this gothic romance set in 19th-century England, a young man falls for his alluring and secretive cousin Rachel, despite his suspicions that she murdered his guardian after altering the latter's will—or that she might be targeting him next. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Sylvia
programme.desc: Alternately brooding and impassioned biopic focusing on the troubled seven-year marriage of poets Sylvia Plath (Gwyneth Paltrow) and Ted Hughes (Daniel Craig). Paltrow brings a subtle, textured air to the role. Her real-life mother, Blythe Danner, plays her screen mom. Christine Jeffs directed. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Absolute Power
programme.desc: A cat burglar becomes a marked man after witnessing the President's involvement in a woman's murder. Later, he sees the Chief Executive go on a public tirade concerning his stand against violence, and decides to fight for justice. Clint Eastwood co-produced, directed and stars as the thief. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Diana, Our Mother Her Life and Legacy
programme.desc: Nearly 20 years after her death, Princess Diana's sons, Prince William and Prince Harry, recall their mother's influence on their lives, her public persona and her humanitarian work as they leaf through a private family album. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Paradise
programme.desc: A 10-year-old spends a summer with an unhappy couple, who eventually come to care for the boy. The youngster becomes close friends with a classmate. Remake of the 1987 French film "Le Grand Chemin" ("The Big Road"). (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Marauders
programme.desc: FBI agents investigating a series of bank robberies initially suspect that the business's owner might be responsible, but they later realize that the heists point toward a much-larger conspiracy. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The 9th Life of Louis Drax
programme.desc: A neurologist investigates the case of a young boy who has somehow repeatedly cheated death after the youth survives yet another near-fatal accident on his ninth birthday. As the doctor becomes obsessed with this mystery, he also develops romantic feelings for the boy's mother. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Wilson
programme.desc: A salty curmudgeon discovers he has a teenage daughter who has been put up for adoption by his ex-wife after their split. He tries to reunite the family, but his abrasive personality makes getting reacquainted unpleasant for everyone. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Winter's Tale
programme.desc: A thief falls for a wealthy woman who's dying of tuberculosis in 1916 New York. Later, he winds up in the modern day and works with a single mother to find a way to reunite with his true love. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Robert Altman's ensemble drama about a dancer (Neve Campbell) trying to make her way to the top of a Chicago ballet troupe. Engrossing story, dazzling choreography. Malcolm McDowell. Campbell, who was once a dancer, approached Altman with the story idea. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: A Perfect World
programme.desc: A Texas lawman pursues an escaped convict who has kidnapped a young boy. Meanwhile, in their dash to the border, the convict and the boy form a father-son attachment. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Take
programme.desc: A maverick CIA agent forges an unlikely bond with a pickpocket after the latter is framed for a bombing in Paris. Soon, they combine their brawn and street smarts to investigate a terrorist conspiracy targeting the city's Bastille Day celebrations. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: A professional bodyguard must protect his longtime nemesis, a ruthless hit man, after the latter agrees to testify at the Hague against a dictator. The bickering pair team up to defeat the dictator's henchmen as they embark on a journey across Europe. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Yes Man
programme.desc: A perennial naysayer becomes a guy who just can't say "no" (and won't) after attending a self-help seminar that challenges him to say yes to everything for a year. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Held Up

programme.title: The Tale
programme.desc: A journalist re-examines her childhood memories after her mother discovers a story she wrote four decades earlier that detail sexual relationships she had with two adult coaches when she was 13 years old. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Gene Generation
programme.desc: In a dystopian future society in which DNA scans are needed to enter cities, a world-class assassin is hired to eliminate rogue DNA hackers. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Nine to Five
programme.desc: Three female office workers become friends and get revenge against their boss, a sexist egotistical lying hypocritical bigot, and in so doing create a more efficient and pleasant work environment. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Ouija Origin of Evil
programme.desc: In 1967 Los Angeles, a widow making ends meet as a psychic is stunned when she finds a Ouija board that actually enables her to talk to the dead. While it's great for business, the board also allows a vengeful ghost to possess her 9-year-old daughter. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Charlie's Angels Full Throttle
programme.desc: The trio must locate stolen rings that contain encrypted information about the Witness Protection Program. They also take on a fallen Angel who has gone over to the dark side. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Man on the Moon
programme.desc: Milos Forman ("One Flew over the Cuckoo's Nest") directed this biography about the zany life and times of actor-comedian Andy Kaufman. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: The Hand that Rocks the Cradle
programme.desc: A widow poses as a nanny to seek revenge against a new mother, who does not know that their pasts are intertwined. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Better Luck Tomorrow
programme.desc: Justin Lin directed and co-wrote this drama about a group of Asian-American scholars turned gangstas in affluent Orange County, Cal. A scathing look at teen hubris and moral disintegration. Lin maxed out 10 credit cards to finance the film, then received a cash advance from MC Hammer. The story is loosely based on a 1992 murder case. Jerry Mathers plays the students' biology teacher. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Dinner for Schmucks
programme.desc: Tim wants to snag a big promotion at work, but to do so he must take an eccentric nutcase to his boss's dinner party, where guests are supposed to bring the strangest person they can find. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: Four gal pals decide they need to take a vacation together after five years apart, and head to New Orleans to have a wild time at the Essence Festival. There, they party hard while confronting their personal issues and romantic dilemmas. (repeat) (cc).

programme.title: Waitress
programme.desc: Charming tale of a pregnant small-town waitress (Keri Russell) hoping to win a pie-baking contest and leave her boorish husband. Adrienne Shelly wrote, directed and costars. Nathan Fillion, Cheryl Hines, Andy Griffith, Jeremy Sisto. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This musical drama chronicles the rise and fall of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons, one of the key pop groups of the early '60s, responsible for such iconic hits as "Sherry," "Walk Like a Man" and "Big Girls Don't Cry." (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: In this female-centric thriller, a jilted ex-wife grows jealous of her former husband's new bride, and decides to destroy the latter's reputation in an attempt to get her old life back. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Blood Work
programme.desc: After his heart transplant, a retired FBI profiler tries to solve the organ donor's murder. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Good Hair

programme.title: The War of the Roses
programme.desc: This dark comedy follows the disintegration of a marriage, from happy first date to domestic discontent to a truly hellish divorce. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Going in Style
programme.desc: Three elderly friends and retired steelworkers are outraged to learn that their pension fund has been raided by a shady corporation. In response, they decide to rob one of the corporation's banks to get their hard-earned money back. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: Identity
programme.desc: On a dark and stormy night, ten strangers are stranded at an isolated motel in the Nevada desert, only to learn each of them has a secret, and that their arrival at the motel has not been a matter of mere chance. (repeat) (cc).(n)

programme.title: King Arthur Legend of the Sword

programme.desc: In this adaptation of the popular video-game series, a death-row convict relives his ancestor's memories as an assassin in 15th-century Spain. From this out-of-body experience, he gains the training he needs to battle a conspiracy in the present day. (cc).

programme.title: Born on the Fourth of July
programme.desc: Oliver Stone's docudrama about paralyzed Vietnam vet Ron Kovic, who tries to reconcile memories of his idealistic youth with his post-war disillusionment. (cc).

programme.title: The Ghost Writer
programme.desc: A British screenwriter (Ewan McGregor) agrees to ghostwrite the memoirs of a retired prime minister, but after he takes the job the former political leader is accused of committing a war crime. Pierce Brosnan, Tom Wilkinson, Olivia Williams. (cc).

programme.title: Jackass The Movie

programme.title: 17 Again
programme.desc: A former high-school basketball star gets a second shot at life after he's miraculously transformed back into a teenager. Back in high school, Mike O'Donnell was an MVP. But then Mike sacrificed everything in order to stay by his expectant girlfriend Scarlett. Twenty years later, Mike's life is falling apart when he's suddenly transported back into his teenage body and he discovers that by trying to recapture his best years, he could risk losing it all. (cc).

programme.title: Land of the Lost
programme.desc: Discredited scientist Dr. Rick Marshall proves his outrageous theories on time travel are true, but in the process he gets stranded with his partners in a strange world full of unusual creatures. His loyal research assistant Holly and firearms enthusiast Will help Marshall befriend a monkey-like beast named Chaka in an attempt to get back home. (cc).

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: Two scientists race to avert a catastrophe when a series of climate-control satellites begin to malfunction. During their mission, they discover a conspiracy involving the satellites, which were designed to prevent natural disasters on Earth. (cc).

programme.desc: An amnesiac CIA assassin tries to piece together his life as he is hunted for elimination by his superiors. (cc).

programme.desc: Three teenagers are kidnapped and imprisoned by a man with multiple-personality disorder, and must plot their escape without ever knowing which of his 23 personas—young or old, male or female, benign or monstrous—they will confront on the way out. (cc).

programme.title: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: A troubled 9-year-old tries to convince her psychologist father that creepy recent events are the work of her imaginary friend. Although he is amused at first, the father soon becomes worried about his daughter's growing emotional problems. (cc).

programme.title: C.B. Strike
