programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: Two scientists race to avert a catastrophe when a series of climate-control satellites begin to malfunction. During their mission, they discover a conspiracy involving the satellites, which were designed to prevent natural disasters on Earth. (cc).

programme.desc: This action thriller offers a high-tech twist on "The Desperate Hours" (1955, 1990). A bank-security expert must break into his own vault when robbers hold his family hostage and demand ransom. (cc).

programme.title: War Dogs
programme.desc: Two down-on-their-luck pals become arms dealers, but get in over their heads when they land a $300 million contract with the U.S. government to supply weaponry to forces in Afghanistan. Based on true events. (cc).

programme.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
programme.desc: A freewheeling womanizer is haunted by his many old flames while attending his younger brother's wedding in this romantic comedy. Having conquered almost the entire bridal party, libidinous celebrity photographer Connor Mead ponders bedding the bride's mother until the Ghosts of Girlfriends Past guide him on an eye-opening tour of his romantic past, present and future. Along the way, they attempt to discern whether Connor will ever be able to change his ways. (cc).

programme.title: Psycho II
programme.desc: Fair sequel to Hitchcock's classic, with Norman Bates (Anthony Perkins) picking up where he left off after 22 years in an institution. Meg Tilly, Vera Miles, Dennis Franz. Richard Franklin directed. (cc).

programme.title: Bootmen
programme.desc: An aspiring tap dancer (Adam Garcia) seeks to rise above his dead-end, factory-worker status in an Australian steel town. Linda: Sophie Lee. Mitchell: Sam Worthington. Walter: William Zappa. Gary: Richard Carter. Sara: Susie Porter. Directed by Dein Perry. (cc).

programme.title: Altitude
programme.desc: When a team of hijackers take over an airplane in an attempt to steal a stash of diamonds, two passengers—an FBI agent and an expert thief—work together to foil their plot. (cc).

programme.title: The Book of Eli
programme.desc: Eli roams a postapocalyptic world, protecting a sacred tome that offers guidance on how to rebuild humanity. The evil Carnegie goes to great lengths to acquire the powerful book, but Carnegie's adopted daughter, who wants to escape her dad's clutches, helps Eli. (cc).

programme.title: Abandon
programme.desc: A bright college student is haunted by her past in this thriller. Katie Burke is a driven senior at a prestigious college whose boyfriend, Embry, vanished years earlier. Katie's life unravels when a cop investigates the disappearance and Embry begins showing up on campus. (cc).

programme.title: A Perfect Getaway
programme.desc: An idyllic Hawaiian vacation turns into a nightmare when Cydney and Cliff (Milla Jovovich and Steve Zahn) discover their lives are in danger from a psychotic killer who is hunting visitors to the island. Timothy Olyphant, Chris Hemsworth, Kiele Sanchez. Directed by David Twohy. (cc).

programme.title: The Big Lebowski
programme.desc: A slacker known to his friends as "The Dude" gets mixed up in a convoluted kidnapping plot with an eccentric millionaire whose name he shares. (cc).

programme.title: Why Him?
programme.desc: An adoring dad is horrified to discover that his daughter's tech-billionaire boyfriend is a tattooed, party-hearty lout. Despite the latter's heart of gold, the father refuses to warm to him—especially when he learns about his engagement plans. (cc).

programme.title: The Pink Panther
programme.desc: Hapless, hopeless and frenetically bumbling Inspector Jacques Clouseau rides again in this tale about a murder investigation involving a famous soccer coach and the search for a one-of-a-kind jewel called the "Pink Panther." (cc).

programme.desc: A successful hit man reevaluates his profession while attending his high-school reunion. (cc).(n)

programme.desc: Jackie is brought back to a dark place, but realizes she wants to move forward in her life through therapy. OG and Kristen butt heads. Tami is over Jen trying to mend fences with her and Evelyn. (repeat).

programme.desc: Between side-boob and side-eye, newbie OG is not winning any friends. Jackie takes up acting in her quest for personal growth. Evelyn strengthens her friendship with Jen as she struggles to make a final decision. (repeat).

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.desc: The Twirlywoos are beside a river. They watch a fisherman make his rod longer and longer and longer. The fisherman casts out the line and then settles down for a nap. Chickedy and Chick run along the rod to the very end. Toodloo runs along the rod and jumps to join Chickedy and Chick. This causes the rod to spring up sending them flying! The fisherman wakes to discover a long, long, long fish at the end of his line. The Twirlywoo Screen draws a small line that Chickedy and Chick help make longer. Toodloo helps the line get a little longer still but when Great BigHoo taps the screen, the line becomes so long it shoots off the Twirlywoo Screen. The line gets longer and longer and goes into the Big Red Boat - right into Peekaboo's house! The Twirlywoos run after the Twirly Rings whilst Peekaboo reels in the long line.

Everyone joins in to help him overcome his fear and soon he's sitting on his seahorse, Blue Yah, excited about his first turn on a merry-go-round.
